Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercadería, consistente en verduras,guisquil, zanahorias, papas, cebollas, etc. Espera en el futuro expandir sus negocio en las demás plazas de la región. Las demás se dedica a la venta de carne, verduras, papas, y atención a tienda de consumo.
texts.en:
Virginia is 51 years old, married, and has seven children. She did not have the opportunity to go to school. She makes a living selling vegetables in her town's plazas. She started this business with a small stall in the plaza and she now has 18 years of experience. She has the support of her husband who also works in the same business.

She has organized a group and is asking for a loan that she will use to buy merchandise consisting of vegetables such as: chayote (a type of squash), carrots, potatoes, onions, etc.

She hopes to expand her business in the future to the remaining plazas in her region. The other group members make a living selling meat, vegetables, potatoes, and running a general store.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Iii Group

texts.es:
La señora Francisca tiene 46 años de edad, cursó solamente un años la educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la comercialización de ovejas, inicio este negocio comercializando ovejas pequeñas y hasta el momento lleva 12 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicitan un crédito para utilizarlo como capital de trabajo, en la compra de ovejas para su posterior reventas y obtener ganancias, espera en el futuro expandir su negocio y tener un vehículo propio para transporta su ganado, y vender en otras plazas. Las demás integrantes se dedican a la venta de carneros, venta de verduras, venta de refacciones, y la atención atienda en general.
texts.en:
Francisca is 46 years old.  She attended primary education for a few years, has two children, and makes a living selling sheep.  She started off by selling small sheep and to this day she has twelve years of experience.  

She organized a group and they are requesting a loan to use as capital to purchase seep for resale and to earn a profit.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business and own a vehicle to transport her livestock to sell out of other locations.   

The other members of the group make a living by selling rams, vegetables, snacks, and other general items.

loans.use: to purchase sheep to sell

loans.name: Grupo Solidario Group

texts.es:
La señora Clara esta casada, tiene 23 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos los cuales aun no estudian, se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de papas tipo F.L., inicio este trabajo con pequeñas porciones de siembre y en terreno prestado y hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que se dedica al mismo trabajo y al comercio.

Organiza un grupo y solicitan un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de semillas y fertilizante para papas, en el futuro espera tener mas terreno y aumentar su producción de papas. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a mismo trabajo.
texts.en:
Clara is married, she is 23 years old, and has 2 children who are not yet studying. She is works in agriculture, planting “FL” type potatoes. She began this work with small portions of seeds and borrowed land and now has 8 year of experience. She has the support of her husband who makes his living in the same work, as well as in trade. 

She organizes a group and it seeks a loan that they will use to buy seeds and fertilizer for the potatoes. In the future, she hopes to have more land and increase the potato production. The other members of the group are also dedicated to the same work.

loans.use: to buy supplies to plant potatoes.

loans.name: Paquixeñas Ii Group

texts.es:
La señora Esmeralda esta casada, tiene 30 años de edad, cursó los 3 años de educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de papa, tipo F.L., inicio este negocio sembrando en terrenos alquilados, lleva 12 años de experiencia, cuanta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un prestamos que lo utilizara para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes, para aumentar su produccion, en el futuro espera tener terrenos mas extenso y poder cosechar e incrementar sus ingresos. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la agricultura específicamente a la siembra de papa tipo Frito Lay.
texts.en:
Esmeralda is a 30-year-old married woman with three years of primary school education. She has five children who are currently in school. She works in agriculture, growing potatoes (Frito Lay variety). Esmeralda started her potato growing business in rented fields, and has 12 years of experience as well as the support of her husband who makes his living at the same work. 

She has organized a group to solicit a loan that will be used to buy seeds and fertilizers to increase her production. In the future, she hopes to have larger fields to harvest and increase her income. 

The other members of the group are also involved in agriculture, specifically growing the Frito Lay variety potato.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for planting potatoes.

loans.name: Carlos Danilo

texts.es: Carlos Danilo tiene 42 años de edad, es casado y tiene cinco hijos, su esposa se dedica a la venta de comida, ellos residen en la Comunidad del Coyolar, San Esteban. El negocio lo comenzó desde hace 10 años con una pequeña venta de arena y piedra, luego fue extendiendo su negocio y ahora también vende bloque, el trabaja en conjunto con sus hijos y su esposa que le ayudan con el sostenimiento del negocio, el horario de trabajo es de 6:00 am hasta las 9:00 pm, una de las ventajas es que no paga personal ya que trabaja con sus hijos y su esposa. El préstamo que Carlos Danilo solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de material como ser: cemento y arena para la elaboración de bloques. Con la ayuda de este préstamo  en su negocio podrá ofrecer más producto a sus clientes ya que tendrá suficiente capital para trabajar e invertirlo en la compra de materiales para producir el bloque y así poder ofrecerles a sus clientes variedad de producto. El único desafío que enfrenta es porque tiene competencia ya que varias personas se dedican a lo mismo, pero Carlos ofrece a sus clientes producto de calidad y un servicio eficiente. Su meta es extender su negocio y dar a conocer nueva variedad de productos a sus clientes. Carlos Danilo ha sido cliente de FAMA por más de 10 ciclos y ha logrado cancelar sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en: Carlos Danilo is 42 years old; he is married and has five children.  His wife sells food for a living.  They live in the community of Coyolar, San Esteban.  He started his business ten years ago with a small sale of sand and stone; he then extended his business and he now also sells cement blocks.  He works along with his children and his wife, who help him to keep up his business.  His work schedule is from 6:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m.  One advantage he has is that he does not have to pay for staff as he works with his children and his wife.  Carlos Danilo needs this loan to invest in materials, such as cement and sand to make cement blocks, so he can offer his customers a variety of products.  The only challenge he faces is competition because there are various other people who do the same thing, but Carlos offers his customers a quality product and efficient service.  His goal is to expand his business and introduce new products for his customers.  Carlos Danila has been a client of FAMA's for over ten loan cycles and he has been able to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es: Don José es casado, tiene 46 años de edad, tiene 2 hijas, su esposa se dedica al comercio y es ama de casa, el es una persona muy amable, servicial y alegre, y tiene una pequeña pulpería en su casa de habitación. Hace algunos años comenzó vendiendo golosinas y poco a poco logro establecer el negocio de la pulpería vendiendo productos como ser: azúcar, arroz, manteca, frijoles y otros productos de uso domestico, luego fue surtiendo su negocio con otros productos que los mismos clientes le recomendaban vender. El trabaja en conjunto con su esposa y en el transcurso del tiempo aprendió a manejar su negocio, su horario de atención inicia a partir de las 6:00 am y culmina a las 7:00 pm. Don José solicita este préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de productos como ser: arroz, azúcar, manteca, sal, frijoles, entre otros. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá surtir su negocio y seguir teniendo una fuente de ingresos que le ayuden con el sostenimiento de su familia. Su meta es incrementar el negocio, que este bien surtido y que sus clientes puedan encontrar todo lo que necesiten. Don José tiene 5 ciclos de recibir el apoyo de FAMA mediante los préstamos obtenidos y ha mantenido un  buen comportamiento de pago.
texts.en: Don José is married, 46, and has two children. His wife is a merchant and a housewife. José is a very likeable, helpful and happy person. He has a small general store in his home. Several years ago he started selling candy, and bit by bit he was able to establish his business selling products such as: sugar, rice, butter, beans, and other home products. He later started stocking other products that his customers would request. He works with his wife. With the passage of time, he has learned to manage his business. His store hours are 6:00 am to 7:00 pm. José is requesting this loan for investing in the purchase of products such as: rice, sugar, butter, salt, beans, and other items. His goal is to expand his business, for it to be well-stocked, and for his customers to be able to find everything they need. José has been receiving the support of FAMA through loans for five cycles, and he has maintained a good payment history.

loans.use: to buy general grocery items.

loans.name: Elvin Yobany

texts.es: El joven Elvin tiene 29 años de edad, es soltero y tiene un hijo, es muy amigable, responsable y trabajador. Se dedica al cultivo del café actividad que aprendió de su padre ya que desde que era un niño el se dedica a este oficio, el decidió cultivar su propia finca  el cual el trabajo lo realiza con algunos trabajadores que le ayudan con el mantenimiento de la finca de café, su horario laboral es de 6:00 am  a 1:00 pm. Por otra parte, una de las ventajas de Elvin es que su propiedad se encuentra en una zona muy apta para el cultivo y por lo tanto la producción del Café se da muy bien. Elvin solicita este préstamo ya que necesita comprar abono y pagar mano de obra para chapear la tierra, y así darle un mejor y adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo. Con la ayuda de este préstamo podrá mantener su finca bien fertilizada y limpia. Su meta es seguir sembrando para llegar a ser un buen productor de café y mantener la finca en buenas condiciones para que esta le genere mayores ganancias y así poder ayudar con el sostenimiento de sus padres y su hijo. Elvin tiene 3 ciclos de recibir el poyo de FAMA con los préstamos obtenidos y piensa invertir muy bien el dinero para pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.
texts.en:
The young Elvin is 29 years old, is single and has one child. He is very friendly, responsible and hard working. He makes a living growing coffee, a skill that he learned from his father, who has made a living in this occupation since Elvin was a child. He has decided to cultivate his own farm. The land is worked by a few laborers who help him with the maintenance of the farm. His work schedule is from 6:00 am until 1:00 pm. On the other hand, one of Elvin's advantages is that his property is located in a zone which is very suitable for the cultivation of coffee and therefore coffee production goes very well. 

Elvin is requesting this loan because he needs to purchase fertilizer and pay his laborers to weed the land, giving him an appropriate and improved maintenance of the farming. With the help of this loan he will be able to maintain his farm well fertilized and clean. His goal is to continue planting in order to become a good coffee producer and keep the farm in good conditions. This will generate better earnings for him and allow him to help support his parents and child. Elvin has had three cycles of receiving support from FAMA with loans he has obtained and expects to invest the money well to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and laborers.

loans.name: Fred

texts.en: Fred wants a loan to pay workers who are  weeding and harvesting his maize and beans respectively He is 56 years old and lives in Masindi, Uganda. He is married and charged with the responsibility of taking care of three children.As a farmer, Fred’s business is hindered by thieves and changing seasons. He desires to diversify his business.

loans.use: to pay workers who are  weeding and harvesting his maize and beans .

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane wants a loan to buy fertilizers so as to rehabilitate her farm land.She is thirty-five years old and lives in Masindi, Uganda. She desires to have a stable income and educate her children.Inadequate capital and seasonal changes hinder her business and her dream is to venture into modernized farming.

loans.use: to  buy fertilizers so as to rehabilitate her farm land.

loans.name: Flor María

texts.es: La señora  Flor maría  es propietaria de una pulpería estable, ubicada en el municipio de san Rafael del sur, tiene aproximadamente veinte años de tener su negocio, ofreciendo así una gran variedad de productos tales como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, variedades de jabón, cosméticos, carnes, entre otras muchas cosas, actualmente está sirviendo como una mini distribuidora de granos básicos, abasteciendo a mini-pulperías ubicados en esta zona, el  crédito con ceprodel lo esta solicitando  para comprar arroz faisán. agradece mucho el apoyo que esta institución le pueda brindar.
texts.en:
Flor María is owner of a small grocery store, located in the municipality of San Rafael del Sur. She has been running her business for around 20 years and offers a great variety of products like rice, sugar, beans, oil, various soaps and cosmetics, meats and many other things. 

She is currently acting as a mini distributor of basic grains supplying mini-grocery stores in the area. The loan she is asking for through Ceprodel is intended for purchasing El Faisán branded rice.

She is thankful for the support this institution is able to offer.

loans.use: to buy El Faisan brand rice.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia valiosa  que le ayuda  a obtener las mejores cosechas, con esto siempre logra mantenerse adelante de la competencia y tener la mayoría de clientela a la hora de comerciar en los alrededores, pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios razonables además del buen servicio, adicional a la siembra Isabel posee un pequeño empleo que le ayuda a completar los gastos del hogar; es un hombre cien por ciento entregado al trabajo, visionario con muchos sueños que desea alcanzar siempre está en las busque de oportunidades que le ayuden a cumplir su objetivo por eso tiene fe que alcanzara el éxito, quiere expandir su negocio y desde hace tiempo quiere aumentar la producción para ella necesita invertir en insumos para dos manzanas de terreno pero necesita de capital por eso razón le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, herbicida, herramientas etc. Isabel es muy responsable y con buena referencia de crédito, está seguro que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Isabel, who is 54 years old, lives with his life companion and their son in his own house. He grows corn and beans. He has worked in agriculture for a number of years, and it has been valuable experience for him, which helps him to obtain the best harvests. With this he always succeeds in staying ahead of the competition and having the majority of the customers when the time comes to sell his products in the surrounding area, since the people know that everything he sells is of good quality and at reasonable prices, and furthermore, comes with good service. In addition to planting crops, Isabel has a small job which helps him to meet the household expenses. He is a man who is one hundred percent dedicated to work, a visionary with many dreams that he wants to achieve. He is always in search of opportunities to help him complete his objectives. For this reason he has faith that he will achieve success. He wants to expand his business, and for some time he has wanted to increase his production. For that he needs to invest in supplies for two manzanas (about 3.5 acres) of land, but he needs capital. For that reason he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, compost, herbicides, tools, etc. Isabel is very responsible and has good credit references. He is sure that he will be able to pay back the loan and at the same time offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, compost, herbicides, and tools

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es: José Luis de sesenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su familia, el desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de hamacas y otros artículos en el mercado municipal de la zona donde vive,  vende las mejores hamacas del lugar con diferentes estilos, colores, tamaños pero sobre todo muy resistentes, es muy conocido por su simpatía con las  personas y por su gran amabilidad tiene mucha clientela y se encuentra adelante de su competencia pues las personas prefieren comprar en su puesto porque saben que todo es de muy buena calidad y a precios bajos; José Luis es un hombre admirable, entregado a su trabajo y a su hogar, quiere esforzase al máximo para lograr un futuro más próspero y cumplir sus sueños, una de sus metas es hacer crecer el pequeño negocio pero para ello necesita invertir en insumo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permite comprar  hamacas por mayor, corvos, lazos, etc.  José Luis tiene buenas referencias de pago y una excelente capacidad crediticia por eso tiene la certeza que logrará pagar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá mejorar la situación económica en su hogar.
texts.en:
José Luis is sixty-eight years old and lives with his family.  He has for many years been a seller of hammocks and other items in the municipal market of the area where he lives.  He sells the best hammocks in the area with different styles, colors, and sizes but over all they are very durable.  He is well known for his sensitivity with other people, and because of his very friendly attitude he has many customers, and he finds himself ahead of the competition since people prefer to buy from his business because they know everything there is of very good quality and at low prices.

José Luis is an admirable man who is dedicated to his work and his household, he wants to work his hardest to achieve a more prosperous future and reach his dreams.  One of his goals is to grow his small business, but for this to happen, he needs to invest in stock.  That's why he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy hammocks at wholesale prices, knives, rope ties etc.  José Luis has good payment references and an excellent credit history and therefore he is certain that he will be able to pay back his loan while at the same time he hopes to improve the economic situation in his household.

loans.use: to buy wholesale hammocks, knives, cordage, etc.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es: Mariano tiene 51 años d edad y  habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar.  Él  se dedica  a la agricultura de los principales granos básicos como son: maíz y frijol. Después de sacar la cosecha  comercializa una parte de su cultivo para poder suplir las necesidades de su hogar que cada día son mayores. Mariano  es un  hombre muy emprendedor y admirable ya que a pesar de su edad sigue trabajando y no se cansa de realizar esta actividad ya que para él,  lo más importante en la vida es ganarse el pan de cada día dignamente con el trabajo de sus manos y el sudor de su frente. Desde niño ha trabajado en la agricultura y es así como ha logrado llevar el sustento a su hogar, vale la pena mencionar que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos diferente  a la agricultura. Como todo hombre visionario con ganas de mejorar su calidad de vida,  ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución, ya que la fecha para empezar las siembras se aproximan y quiere estar preparada.  Es por esta razón que solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas (semillas, insecticidas, abonos, etc.) para comenzar la siembra lo más pronto posible y poder cosechar los frutos de su esfuerzo. Tiene mucha confianza que con la ayuda de Dios y de esta institución logrará salir adelante y podrá dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mariano is 51 years old and lives in his own home with his family.  He works in agriculture growing basic crops like corn and beans.  After the harvest, he sells part of his crops to supply to household necessities, which are greater every day.  Mariano is a very hardworking and admirable man, and even with his age he continues to work and never tires of his work, since for him the most important thing in life is to bring home the bacon every day with dignity by the work of his hands and the sweat of his brow.

Since he was a child, he has worked in the field of agriculture, and that's how he has gained sustenance for his household, it's worth mentioning that he has no other source of income to count on outside of agriculture.  Like any other visionary man with the will to improve his life, he has decided to align himself with this lending institution, since it is getting close to the season to sow his seeds and he wants to be prepared.  It is for this reason that he is asking for this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in buying agricultural inputs (seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc.) to begin the planting as soon as possible and be able to harvest the fruits of his labor.  He has great faith that with the help of God and this institution, he will be able to get ahead and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es: Matilde vive junto a su compañero de vida y su madre que ya es mayor de edad; Ella se dedica a la venta de embutidos, chorizo, salchicha, butifarras, entre otros, su pequeño negocio está ubicado en  el mercado municipal de la zona, es muy conocida pues lo que comercia es de calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles; Matilde es una mujer muy alegre y servicial tiene muchas metas que desea alcanzar, trabaja muy duro día con día para lograr su objetivo y no pretende rendirse, quiere ver crecer su negocio y ahora que ha aumentado la demanda aprovechará para invertir en más insumos pero necesita de un respaldo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar producto para la fabricación de chorizo y preparar carne y costilla de cerdo. Matilde es responsable con una moral intachable, posee capacidad crediticia y tiene la certeza que podrá saldar el financiamiento, al mismo tiempo tiene fe que logrará que su familia tenga mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Matilde lives together with her domestic partner and her mother, who is already older. She works selling different types of sausages; her small business is located in the region’s local market. It is well known because the goods she sells are high quality, and she offers them at affordable prices. 

Matilde is a very happy and helpful woman. She has many goals that she wishes to reach; she works very hard day after day in order to fulfill her objectives, and she doesn’t give up. She wants to see her business grow, and now that demand has increased, she will make the most of it and invest in more supplies. However, she needs more capital. Therefore, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy supplies for making sausages and preparing meat and pork ribs. 

Matilde is responsible with excellent moral character; she has good credit standing, and she is certain that she can pay off her debt. At the same time, she has faith that her family will be able to attain a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing sausages, meat, and pork ribs.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es: Rosa Elvira de cuarenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida que es sastre y sus cuatro hijos, en una vivienda que le  falta poco por terminar de pagar para que sea propia; Ella se dedica a la confección y venta de ropa, es muy conocida y tiene mucha clientela fija, le trabaja a un señor en  especial que siempre le encarga pantalones y camisas porque sabe la calidad de trabajo de Rosa además tiene clientes para diferentes épocas elabora uniformes, trajes de cachiporristas, uniformes de bandas escolares, y todo clase de ropa para dama y caballero que soliciten, el negocio le dan muy buenos resultados por eso siempre se mantiene adelante de su competencia además da buenos ´precios y el servicio es excelente; Rosa Elvira es una mujer trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir afuera a cumplir sus sueños, siempre está a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar la meta, en esta ocasión necesita invertir en materia prima para no decepcionar a los clientes pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar telas por mayor, hilos, agujas, etc. Rosa es muy  responsable y con capacidad de pago está segura que podrá saldar la deuda y tiene de apoyo el respaldo del esposo, al mismo tiempo tiene la confianza que con esfuerzo logrará llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa Elvira is 48 years old and lives with her partner (who is a tailor) and their four children. She and her partner have almost completely paid off their house, which they will then own. She makes a living as a seamstress and by selling clothes. Rosa Elvira is very well-known and has many regular customers. For example, one man in particular always comes to Rosa for his pants and shirts because he knows the quality of her work. In addition, she has customers who have at different times ordered uniforms, majorette/cheerleader outfits, school band uniforms, and all kinds of men's and women's clothing. Her business does very well, because she is always able to stay ahead of the competition as well as offer good prices and excellent service. 

Rosa Elvira is a hard-working woman who is eager to fulfill her dreams. She always is looking out for opportunities that will help her to achieve her goals. In this case, she needs to invest in raw materials so as not to disappoint her clients, but she does not have sufficient capital to do so. She is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy wholesale fabric, thread, needles, etc. Rosa Elvira is very responsible and is sure to be able to pay back the loan. She has the support of her husband, and also the confidence that with effort, she will succeed in gaining economic security for her household.

loans.use: to buy wholesale fabric, thread, needles

loans.name: Melisa Mariel

texts.es: Melissa Mariel tiene 31 años de edad y habita junto a sus hijas de 14 y 9 años de edad, las cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ella  se dedica al comercio de ropa usada y nueva.   El negocio tiene mas de 3 años de existir por lo que ya es muy conocido por muchas personas pertenecientes a la zona donde habita. Es muy trabajadora, emprendedora, inteligente, y responsable. Desde hace algunos años decidió poner su negocio  de ropa, debido  a que es madre soltera y es el principal soporte económico de su familia.  Es así como cada día se levanta muy temprano para realizar todas las tareas del hogar, atender  a su familia y luego atender el negocio. Muchas personas la prefieren  ya que es una mujer muy amable y responsable, pero lo más importante es que los clientes siempre encuentran lo que buscas  a los mejores precios. Su sueño es poder incrementar su inventario para poder aumentar sus ventas de tal forma que pueda incrementar sus ingresos y de esta forma poder ayudar de mejor  manera a su familia. Solicita este crédito para invertir en la compra de  dos fardos de ropa usada y además desea comprar ropa nueva. De esta forma espera lograr cumplir su sueño de accesar a una mejor calidad de vida. Es muy importante mencionar que expresa estar muy agradecida con esta institución, INTEGRAL, ya que en el pasado le brindaron la ayuda que solicito al igual que este momento.
texts.en: Melisa Mariel is 31 years old and lives with her two daughters, ages 14 and 9, who are in school. She sells new and used clothing. Her business has existed for more than 3 years, and is well-known by many people in her neighborhood. Melisa is very hard-working, business-minded, intelligent, and responsible. A few years ago, she decided to start her clothing business because she is a single mother, and it is the main source of income for her family. Every day she wakes up very early to do all of the household chores, take care of her family, and then attend to her business. Many people prefer her business because Melisa is a very friendly and responsible woman, but most importantly, her customers always find what they are looking for at the best prices. Her dream is to be able to build her inventory to increase sales, and in this way, be able to increase her income and better support her family. Melisa is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of two lots of used clothes and to buy new clothing. Through this, she hopes she will succeed in achieving her dream of reaching a better quality of life. It is very important to mention that she is very grateful to the  INTEGRAL organization for having previously helped her with a request similar to this one.

loans.use: to buy two lots of new and used clothing.

loans.name: Ezri Humberto

texts.es: Ezri Humberto tiene 23 años  de edad y habita en casa de propiedad junto con su familia. Desde hace muchos años él  y su familia dependen de la agricultura principalmente del cultivo de maíz y de maicillo.  Además de realizar está actividad hace algunos trabajos por temporada en el área de albañilería. Tiene 7 años de experiencia cultivando la tierra por lo que ya es muy conocido en la zona, y tiene algunos clientes fijos los cuales lo prefieren por ser un hombre trabajador, emprendedor y responsable.  Como todo hombre emprendedor con deseos de superarse y continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar a tomado la decisión de solicitar   este crédito que le permita invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) para dar inicio a la siembra temporada 2012, que es muy importante para él y su familia, ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Tiene plena confianza que de esta forma logrará salir adelante y podrá dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ezri Humberto is 23 years old and lives with his family in their own home. For many years, he and his family have made their living in agriculture, mostly growing corn and sorghum. In addition to doing this work, he also takes seasonal work in masonry. Ezri Humberto has seven years of experience working the land, so he is well-known in the area, and has regular customers who appreciate that he is a hard-working, responsible businessman. As an entrepreneur with a desire to excel and to continue supporting his family, he has made the decision to ask for a loan that will allow him to invest in the purchase of necessary supplies (seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.) to begin the 2012 growing season, which is very important to him and his family as it is their primary source of income. He is confident that in this way, he will be able to get ahead and give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Nelson Antonio

texts.es: Nelson Antonio tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su esposa e hijos. Tiene 9 años de dedicarse a la venta de herramientas y productos usados a orilla de calle de mucho transito de personas. Es un hombre muy conocido en la zona ya que por su buen desempeño en su trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes y además es un hombre emprendedor, responsable, y muy generoso. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su trabajo y de su persona. Cuenta con algunos clientes fijos, los cuales cada día lo prefieren más. Él y su familia habitan en condiciones muy humildes y sencillas. Trabaja muy duro para poder da su familia una calidad de vida diferente. Con deseos de superarse y mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este credito a INTEGRAL para ampliar su casa, reparar el techo, algunas grietas de sus paredes y mejorar el piso. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en los materiales necesarios para éstas obras como: ladrillo, arena, cemento, laminas, espera además realizar la construcción de un cuarto, ya que sus hijos están creciendo y desea darles un espacio apropiado para su desarrollo.
texts.en: Nelson Antonio is 40 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his wife and children.  For 9 years he has made a living selling tools and second-hand products; he sells his products on the edge of a street where there is a high volume of pedestrian traffic.  Nelson Antonio is well known in the area because he does his job well and has earned the trust of his customers; he is also known for being enterprising, responsible, and very generous.  Many people give Nelson Antonio good work references and character references.  He has regular customers who prefer to buy from him each day.  Nelson Antonio and his family live in very humble and simple conditions.  He works very hard so he can give his family a better quality of life.  He hopes to improve his family’s living conditions, and so he has decided to ask for a loan from Apoyo Integral so he can enlarge his house, fix the roof, repair some cracks in the walls, and improve the floor.  He will use the loan to buy the materials he needs, including bricks, sand, cement, and sheets of metal.  He also hopes to build a room, since his children are growing and he wants to provide them with a suitable space for their development.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, sand, cement, and sheets of metal for enlarging and repairing his home.

loans.name: Leonel Antonio

texts.es: Leonel Antonio tiene 26 años de edad, y  habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su grupo familiar. El se dedica a la agricultura desde hace muchos años. Desde muy pequeño aprendió a cultivar la tierra y esta es la actividad que ahora le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Trabaja muy duro para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida, diferentes a las que él ha tenido acceso. Él es el principal soporte económico de su familia, por lo que se siente comprometido y muy entregado en sus labores ya que no pierde de vista que de  él depende el bienestar de su familia. Con deseos de superarse y continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar ha tomado la decisión de solicitar esta ayuda a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas necesarios (abonos, insecticidas, semillas, etc.) para dar inicio a esta gran tarea que es muy importante para el sostenimiento de él y de su familia.
texts.en:
Leonel Antonio, 26, lives in a house on his land together with a group of family members  He has been a farmer for many years.  He learned how to cultivate the land from the time he was very young and it is this business that allows him to put the bread on the table for his family.  He works very hard to improve the living conditions for his family; he wants them to have other options than the ones he himself had.  He is the principle economic support for his family and he feels very committed and devoted to  his work and doesn’t want to lose sight of the fact that their welfare depends on him.  
He wishes to improve himself and continuing raising their standard of living so he decided to seek help from INTEGRAL for  money to purchase the necessary farming supplies (fertilizer, insecticides, seeds, etc) to give a push to the big job that is very important for him and for his family’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, seeds, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase backpacks, sandals, and toothpaste, etc.

loans.name: Edith Del Carmen

texts.es: Edith del Carmen tiene 24 años de edad, y habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos uno de los cuales estudia.   Ella se dedica al comercio de mariscos desde hace muchos años y a la elaboración y venta de tortillas. La venta de mariscos la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas del lugar donde habita. Es muy conocida en la zona como una mujer trabajadora, luchadora, y muy responsable. Con ocho años de experiencia en la venta de mariscos ha logrado ganarse muchos clientes los cuales la prefieren ya que siempre mantiene  producto fresco y a muy buenos precios. Ella siempre trata de mantener satisfechos a sus clientes ya que está segura que solo de esa forma seguirán prefiriéndola y demandando sus mariscos. Con el objetivo de darle un impulso a su negocio ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mariscos para su respectiva comercialización al por mayor, desea comprar camarones de mar y rio, curvina, macarela, entre otras variedades, con el fin de aumentar el nivel de ventas y de ingresos y así poder continuar satisfaciendo las necesidades de su familia y tratar de mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Edith del Carmen is 24 years old.  She lives with her family, which includes her life partner and their two children, one of whom is in school.  She makes a living selling seafood, which she has done for many years, and also makes and sells tortillas.  She sells the seafood as a street vendor in different parts of the area where she lives.  Edith del Carmen is very well known in the area for being hardworking, determined, and very responsible.  She has eight years of experience selling seafood and has gained many customers who like to buy from her because she always has fresh seafood that she offers at excellent prices.  She always tries to keep her customers satisfied, since that is the only way they will keep coming back to purchase her seafood.  Edith del Carmen has decided to request a loan from Apoyo Integral so she can give a boost to her business.  She will use the loan to purchase seafood to sell wholesale; she wants to purchase saltwater and freshwater shrimp, along with corvina, mackerel, and other types of seafood.  This will allow her to increase her level of sales and income so she can continue meeting her family’s needs and trying to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase saltwater and freshwater shrimp, mackerel, and other types of seafood.

loans.name: Deisi Yolanda

texts.es: Deisi Yolanda tiene 51  años de edad y habita junto a su hijo, el cual se encuentra estudiando. Se dedica al comercio de calzado para todos los gustos y preferencias.  Gracias a su facilidad en los negocio ha logrado establecer dos puestos de zapatos en los cuales ofrece variedad de calzado tanto para hombre como para mujer. Tiene mucha experiencia en la venta de calzado. La ubicación de los puestos de zapatos se encuentran en zonas muy estratégicas puesto que uno se ubica en el mercado central de la zona donde reside y el otro en una de las calles principales de su municipio. Es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado sacar adelante a su querida familia la cual es muy sencilla y humilde. Como toda una  mujer visionaria con deseos de superarse ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería,  es decir, comprar variedad de zapatos para todos los gustos y preferencia y así poder atraer a más clientes que le permitan aumentar sus ventas e ingresos para accesar a una mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Deisi Yolanda is fifty-one years old and lives with her son, who is a student. She makes a living selling shoes for all tastes and preferences. Thanks to her skill in business, she has been able to establish two shoe stores, in which she offers a variety of shoes for men and women. She has a great deal of experience in shoe sales. Her shops are located in strategic areas: one is in the central market of the area she lives in, and the other is on one of the main streets of her town. 

Deisi Yolanda is an enterprising and hard-working woman. With a great deal of strength and dedication, she has been able to get her modest, humble family ahead in the world. Above all a visionary woman with the desire to succeed, Deisi Yolanda has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL in order to purchase more merchandise—which is to say, to buy a variety of shoes for all tastes and preferences. In doing so, she will attract more clients, which in turn will permit her to increase her sales and income and to access a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of shoes for all tastes and preferences

loans.name: Alicia Del Carmen

texts.es: Alicia del Carmen, es una Señora muy luchadora quien se dedica a coser ropa en su casa, lugar donde sus clientes la buscan por su dedicado trabajo y buen servicio, así mismo para contar con una mejor vida ella trabaja en sus tiempos libres vendiendo productos de belleza los cuales aprovecha vender con las personas que llegan a su casa o visita a sus clientes en sus hogares. Debido a que vive únicamente con un hijo el cual trabaja como vendedor de productos diversos, Alicia desea contar con el dinero necesario para invertirlo en la compra de más productos de bellezas, como cremas para el cuerpo y rostro, maquillaje, perfumes y todo lo que le pueda facilitar el aumento de ingresos para su hogar y de esta forma contar con una economía un poco más estable junto a su hijo.
texts.en: Alicia del Carmen is a very determined woman. She makes her living sewing clothing in her home, and her clients seek her out for her careful work and good service. In order to achieve a better life, she also sells beauty products in her free time, taking advantage of the opportunity to sell to the customers who come to her house or whom she visits in their homes. Since she lives only with her son (who works as a vendor of various products), Alicia wants to acquire the capital necessary for buying more beauty products such as cremes for the body and face, makeup, perfumes, and anything else that will help her increase her household income. In this way, she will be able to count on somewhat more stable finances for her and her son.

loans.use: to buy beauty products such as creams for the body and face, makeup, and perfumes.

loans.name: Rina Elizabeth

texts.es: Rina Elizabeth tiene 35 años de edad y es una madre de familia muy responsable y trabajadora, quien vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos menores de edad, los cuales se dedican a estudiar. Rina tiene el sueño de que sus hijos salgan adelante y sean personas profesionales, por lo que cuenta con una pequeña farmacia en su hogar con la que le brinda una ayuda muy oportuna a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y de su familia. Rina solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el deseo de surtir su farmacia con muchas más medicinas, así mismo incluir otros productos como refrescos, bolsitas de shampú, dulces, y mucho más, con esto Rina podrá brindar un mejor servicio y aprovechar al máximo el hecho de que es la única farmacia en su colonia.
texts.en: Rina Elizabeth is thirty-five years old and the mother of a very responsible and hardworking family. She lives with her husband and three children. All minors, her children dedicate themselves to their studies. Rina dreams that they will get ahead and grow up to be professionals. To this purpose, she maintains a little pharmacy in her home with which she brings a little bit of very opportune help to her husband with expenses of the home and family. Rina is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL with the desire to stock her pharmacy with many more medicines, along with other products such as sodas, little bags of shampoo, candies, and much more. With this, Rina will be able to provide better service and take maximum advantage of the fact that she is the only pharmacy in her area.

loans.use: to buy medicines to stock pharmacies, along with other products such as sodas, little bags of shampoo, candies, and much more

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo tiene como profesión el ser albañil, el cual es un trabajo que desempeña por obras, cuando estas finalizan el debe dedicarse a otra actividad para poder seguir sosteniendo su hogar en donde vive únicamente junto a su esposa, quien también es una persona muy trabajadora. Eduardo de 42 años también se dedica a la venta de ropa como blusas, calzonetas, ropa interior y camisetas, estas las comercializa de forma ambulante, por lo que día con día desde horas muy tempranas de la mañana inicia su jornada ofreciendo sus productos de casa en casa, actividad la cual la realiza junto a su esposa.  Eduardo solicita un préstamo para poder comprar más estilos y colores de blusas y así mismo desea comprar jeans para hombres y mujeres, con lo que espera aumentar en gran manera su demanda como también sus ingresos diarios y así crecer en su negocio.
texts.en: Eduardo is a builder by profession, so he works by the job rather than by the hour. When his work is done, he devotes himself to an additional business in order to be able to continue maintaining his home, where he lives with his wife, who is also a very hardworking person. At forty-two years old, Eduardo also makes his living selling clothing such as blouses, shorts, undergarments, and shirts. He sells door to door, so that day to day from very early in the morning he begins his journey, offering his products from house to house. His wife helps him in this business. Eduardo is requesting a loan in order to be able to buy more styles and colors of blouses and also to buy jeans for men and women, with which he hopes to increase his demand significantly and also his daily income and in this way to grow his business.

loans.use: to buy pants to sell

loans.name: Elba Del Rosario

texts.es: Elba del Rosario se ha dedica a la ganadería y el cultivo durante toda su vida, esta es una profesión heredada por sus padres, la cual aprendió a realizarla a la perfección. Ella vive junto a su madre de edad avanzada quien a pesar de esto le ayuda con las actividades diarias tanto de su hogar como de su negocio, así mismo vive junto a una pequeña nieta la cual depende por completo de ella. Elba siembra arroz y frijoles, los cuales son granos básicos muy bien vendidos en este país. Gracias a esta actividad es como actualmente ha logrado salir adelante junto a su pequeña familia. Elba solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder hacer crecer más sus negocios, comprando ganado lechero, con lo que espera aumentar sus ventas y su clientela no solo vendiendo el ganado que críe sino también comercializando leche y así también aumentar su venta de granos básico, ganancias con las cuales esta segura podrá cancelar el préstamo solicitado.
texts.en: Elba del Rosario has made her living through farming and livestock for all her life. She inherited the profession from her parents, who taught her to perform to perfection. She lives with her mother of very advanced age, who in spite of this helps her with the daily activities both in the house and business. She also lives her her little niece, who depends on her completely. She plants rice and beans, which are basic grains that sell very well in this country. Thanks to this business she has just recently been able to get ahead with her little family. Elba is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to be able to grow her business, buying a herd of milk cows, with which she hopes to increase her sales and her clientele by selling not only the livestock that she cares for but also milk. In this way, she will also increase her sale of basic grains. With these gains she is sure she will be able to pay back the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy beans and rice to plant

loans.name: María Estela

texts.es: María Estela de 37 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo quien se dedica a trabajar por el bien de su familia, y así mismo vive junto a sus dos hijos pequeños. María es conocida como una persona muy responsable, trabajadora y amable con sus clientes, por lo que posee una demanda bastante amplia. Ella posee una pequeña tienda y sorbetería y así mismo se dedica a la venta de ropa; durante muchos años María ha ido intentando aumentar su inventario  y poder contar con productos nuevos que las personas desean. Por esta razón María solicita un préstamo el cual le facilite poder incrementar la variedad de productos comestibles y de conveniencia como jugos, leche, lácteos, pan, champú, jabón y mucho más, de esta misma manera ella desea invertir en su venta de ropa comprando mayor cantidad de blusas, calcetines, pantalones y shorts, con lo que ella podría garantizar el aumento de ingresos que son de mucho beneficio para su hogar.
texts.en: Maria Estela is 37 years old. She lives with her husband, who works for the good of his family, and their two little children. Maria is known for being a very responsible and hard-working person who is gracious to her customers, and for that reason she has quite an extensive clientele.  She has a little store and sorbet shop, and she also sells clothing. For many years Maria has been trying to increase her inventory and have the new products that people want. For this reason, Maria is applying for a loan that will allow her to increase her variety of food and convenience products such as juices, milk, milk products, bread, shampoo, soap, and many other items. In the same way, she wants to invest in her clothing sales by buying a greater quantity of blouses, socks, pants, and shorts, with which she will be able to guarantee the increase in income that will be of great benefit to her household.

loans.use: to buy perishable products and clothing

loans.name: Narcizo

texts.es: Narcizo de 51 años de edad, vive con sus esposa e hijos,  dos de ellos trabajan y aportan para el hogar, viven en casa propia. El es muy trabajador y se esmera día a día para ser el mejor agricultor de la zona, es muy atento, colaborador y dispuesto hacer el mejor esfuerzo en el cultivo. Narcizo se dedica al cultivo del maíz y tienen un terreno donde con esfuerzo y esmero saca las mejores cosechas y gracias a esto él es muy conocido en la zona y las personas prefieren sus insumos ya que es muy dedicado y los da a los mejores precios. Desea ampliar sus cosechas y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas para el cultivo del maíz como fertilizante, abonos, semillas, y está seguro que con  el beneficio que obtendrá le dará una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Narcizo is 51 years old. He lives with his wife and children, two of whom work and support the household. They live in their own home. He is very hard-working and focuses day after day on being the best farmer in the district. He is very careful and cooperative and ready to make his best effort in his fields. Narcizo grows corn and has a plot of land where, with effort and conscientiousness, he extracts the best harvests, and thanks to this he is very well known in the district. People prefer his products since he is very dedicated and sells them at the best prices. He wants to increase his harvests and it is for this reason that he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy agricultural supplies to grow corn, such as fertilizer, compost, and seeds. He is sure that with the profits that he will obtain he will give a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to grow corn, such as fertilizer, compost, and corn seeds.

loans.name: Carlos Eusebio

texts.es: Carlos Eusebio de 46 años, vive en casa propia con su esposa e hijo menor de edad, Carlos se dedica a la venta de cocos y junto a su esposa tienen además un negocio de antojitos, vende verduras cultivadas por el mismo. La venta está ubicada en su casa. Carlos es muy trabajador y busca la manera de salir adelante por su hijo menor y su esposa,  él necesita hacer crecer su negocio y aprovechando que ya posee clientela fija y siente que el espacio no es muy grande, solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para comprar productos y mejorar su negocio con mesas nuevas, sillas, una plancha mas grande. Esta seguro que con las ventas diarias que saca logrará pagar a tiempo el préstamo requerido y ofrecerá a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carlos Eusebio is 46 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and son, who is a minor. Carlos sells coconuts, and in addition he and his wife have a snack business. He also sells vegetables that he grows himself. His business is located in his house. Carlos is very hard-working and looks for ways to advance for his young son and his wife. He needs to grow his business, and capitalizing on the fact that he already has regular customers, he feels that the space [for his business] is not very large. He is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy products and improve his business with new tables and chairs and a bigger griddle. He is sure that with the daily sales he obtains he will succeed in making his loan payments on time and will offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products and improve his business with new tables and chairs and a bigger griddle

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana de 53 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida, y sus dos hijos quienes son independientes en casa propia en la zona costera del país. Juana desde hace 14 años se dedica al oficio de confección de prendas de vestir, es muy conocida en su lugar de residencia y las personas prefieren ir a donde ella para hacerles sus ropas, ya que confecciona a la medida y gustos de sus cliente, es muy alegre y emprendedora porque además junto a su esposo y sus hijos se dedican a la agricultura siembra maíz, frijol y pipianes.  Juana desea mejorar su modo de vida y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo con el cual ella desea comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, herbicidas, herramientas, semillas, así como también el pago de la mano de obra para sembrar 2 manzanas de terreno, ya que siente que ella  está segura que este año podría obtener mejores cosechas, y si es así, pagar el préstamo antes de lo previsto.
texts.en:
Juana, who is 53 years old, lives with her life partner and their two children.  They are independent in their own home in the coastal area of the country.  Juana has engaged in the craft of tailoring clothing for the past 14 years.  She is very well-known in the area where she resides and people prefer to go to her to do their clothing since she makes custom [clothing] to the taste of her customers.     

She is very cheerful and enterprising because, in addition [to her other activities], together with her spouse and her children she works in agriculture: the planting of corn, beans, and squash.  Juana would like to better her way of life and for that reason is requesting a loan [through] Apoyo Integral with which she would like to buy agricultural products like fertilizers, herbicides, tools, and seeds, as well as [use the loan] for the payment of the labor to plant two acres of land.  She feels confident that she will be able to obtain better harvests this year; and if that does happen, she will repay the loan ahead of schedule.

loans.use: to buy agricultural products like fertilizers, herbicides, tools, and seeds.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: Lucia  se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz desde hace más de 20 años, este es un trabajo que aprendió de sus padres, y que ella decidió seguir. Lucia cuenta con una pequeña parcela la cual desea aprovecharla al máximo lo que ha sido muy difícil hasta el momento ya que no contaba con el dinero necesario para hacerlo. Lucia tiene 57 años y vive junto a su esposo e hijos, toda la familia realiza el mismo trabajo, gracias a lo cual han logrado salir adelante.  Lucia solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar todos los insumos necesarios para la siembra, con lo que ella espera obtener mayor cantidad de cosecha. Así mismo Lucia desea comprar más pesticidas para garantizar el bienestar de su cosecha, lo que será de mucho beneficio para su negocio.
texts.en:
Lucia has been making a living growing beans and corn for more than twenty years. This is a job she learned from her parents and decided to continue. Lucia has a small plot of land which she hopes to utilize to its fullest extent, although it has been difficult since she has not had the necessary money to do so. 

Lucia is 57 years old and lives with her husband and children. The entire family works in the same business, which has allowed them to get ahead. Lucia requests a loan to buy all of the necessary supplies for the planting season. With this she hopes to have a larger harvest. She also hopes to buy more pesticides to guarantee the welfare of her crops, which would be very beneficial to her business.

loans.use: to purchase beans and corn to sow.

loans.name: Ruth Elizabeth

texts.es: Ruth Elizabeth vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos. Actualmente se dedica a la elaboración de ropa deportiva para caballero, señoritas y niños en taller de confección instalado en su misma casa de residencia, cuando no se dedica a la confección cultiva maíz, frijoles, arroz y hortalizas. Es una persona muy alegre que cada mañana se levanta con entusiasmo y alegría, para desempeñar y elaborar los trabajos que realiza, es una persona muy conocida por los vecinos por ser responsable y colaboradora, alegre, entregada a su trabajo. Desea hacer crecer su negocio, dándole mantenimiento, y empleando mejores productos y es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un préstamo para poder realizar mejor su trabajo como una máquina de coser eléctrica, tijeras, agujas, tela, entre otras cosas y así ser más eficiente a la hora de hacer la entrega de sus trabajos, confía en que pagará el préstamo ya que gracias a Dios, posee clientela fija y trata la manera de  para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Ruth Elizabeth lives with her partner and two children. Currently, she makes a living from making sportswear for men, ladies and children. Her clothing shop is located in her own house. When she is not making cloths she grows corn, beans, rice and vegetables.

She is a very happy person that every morning rises with enthusiasm and joy to do her work. She is a well known by the neighbors for being responsible, collaborator, cheerful and dedicated to her work.

Her wish is to grow her business by giving it good maintenance and by using the best materials and for this reason she is requesting a loan to Integral (Field Partner). In order to do a better work and be more efficient, she wants to buy a sewing machine, scissors, needles, fabric, among other things. As a result, she would be more efficient when it comes to the delivery of her products. She trusts that she will pay back the loan because thanks to God, she has a good customer base. She looks ways to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, scissors, needles, fabric, among other things.

He is asking for a loan amount of P25,000 to buy seeds, pesticides and fertilizers. Hopefully, this time he can have a big yield so that he can save for the future of his family as well as for his business.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora has been in the livestock business for three years.She raised and fattened five hogs.Her spouse is a farmer and a carpenter.

Her priority is to send her youngest child to school so, she endures all the hardship in running her hog raising business.  Her situation pushes her to strive hard in order to obtain a higher income and provide for her family’s needs.

Leonora says that the profits gained from the business were not sufficient to meet all their needs so, she is asking for a loan of 15,000 PHP.   She will use this loan to buy livestock feed, vitamins and vaccines to ensure that the hogs she raises are healthy upon reaching their optimum growth.

Leonora would like to strengthen her hog raising business and to save for her youngest child’s high school and college education.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed, vitamins and vaccine for her hog raising business.

loans.name: Shirin

texts.en:
Shirin is 30 years old, married and the mother of six children. She lives in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan.

Shirin is requesting a loan of 500 JOD so that she can expand her general trade business by buying larger quantities of Russian gold and cosmetics, makeup and blankets. This loan will allow her income to increase.

loans.use: to conduct general trading in Russian gold and cosmetics, makeup and blankets.

loans.name: Aroob

texts.en:
Aroob is 50 years old. She is a widow and the mother of two children. She lives in Irbid, Jordan.

Aroob is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD so she can improve her home living conditions and fix her home.

loans.use: to improve her home living conditions.

loans.name: Baraa

texts.en:
Baraa is a 24-year-old married woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and the mother of one child.

Baraa sells cosmetics from her house, and she is requesting a loan of 1,200 JOD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes.

Baraa is looking to establish her own shop and purchase a house for the family.

Because Baraa is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics products for trading purposes.

loans.name: Alia'a

texts.en:
Alia'a is a 37-year-old married woman. She lives in Al Russeifeh, Jordan.

Alia'a is looking to have a loan of 600 JOD so she can buy more quantities of clothes for trading. Her income will increase.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for trading.

loans.name: Aref

texts.en:
Aref is a 50-year-old man from Al-Hashmi-Amman, Jordan who supports eight family members. He wants to improve his family's living conditions.

Aref has a small grocery store and is requesting a loan of 1200 JOD to purchase more goods and products for trading purposes.

loans.use: to purchase goods and products for his grocery store.

loans.name: Maisoon

texts.en:
Maisoon is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Maisoon is 26 years old and married. She is a mother of two children and lives in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan.

Maisoon is looking to have a loan of 1,000 JOD to buy new furniture for her home and install flooring for the home.

Maisoon is under 30 years old so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy new furntire for her home

loans.name: Zohor

texts.en:
Zohor is a 41 years old and married. She is from al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. 

Zohor makes straw products and accessories by.hand. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase materials needed for making accessories and straw products.
.
Zohor is looking to establish her own shop so that she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make straw products and accessories

loans.name: Yousuf

texts.en:
Yousuf is 48 years old, married and a father of three children. He lives in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan.

Yousuf is looking to have a loan of 1,500 JOD to buy more fruits and vegetables for trading so his income will increase.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Tamer

texts.en:
Tamer is 20 years old and single. He lives in Jabal Al Hussein, Amman, Jordan.

Tamer is looking to have a loan of 2,000 JOD to buy more timber, fabric and sponge for his upholstery service.

Tamer is under 30 years old so his loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy timber, fabric and sponge

loans.name: Fula

texts.en:
Fula is 44 years old and single. She lives in Aqaba, Jordan.

Fula is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD to buy furniture and a sofa set for her home to be more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her home

loans.name: Ahlam

texts.en:
Ahlam is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her husband.

Ahlam is 26 years old and married. She is a mother of five children and she lives in Sahab, Jordan.

Ahlam is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD to buy more quantities of clothes for trading purposes.

Ahlam is under 30 years old so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amneh is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is her brother.

Amneh is a 30-year-old married woman from Hay Nazal, Jordan and she supports two members of her family.

Amneh is working from her house. She sells clothes and is requesting a loan of 600 JD to purchase more quantities for trading purposes.

Amneh is looking to purchase a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve his home living conditions and make repairs

loans.name: Jihad

texts.en:
Jihad is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the internet. The photo is of her son

Jihad is 45 years old, married and a mother of six children. She lives in Al Karak, Jordan.

Jihad is looking to have a loan of 400 JOD to buy raw materials to make cheese and yoghurt for trading purposes.

loans.use: to buy raw material to make cheese and yoghurt

loans.name: Amneh

texts.en:
Amenh is a conservative person who is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is her husband.

Amneh is a 29-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan and supports three members of her family.

Amneh is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance on her house.

Amneh is looking to insure her children's higher education.

Because Amneh is under 30 years old, her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is 26 years old and married. She lives in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan and is a mother of three children

Amal is looking to have a loan of 600 JOD to buy more quantities of clothes for trading purposes.

Amal is under 30 years old so her loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for trading

loans.name: Kholoud

texts.en:
Kholoud is a 25-year-old woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan and supports two members of her family.

Kholoud is looking to improve her family's living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 800 JD to do maintenance on her house. She is planning to renew her house furniture. 

Because Kholoud is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Suzan

texts.en:
Suzan is a 32-year-old widow from Al Russeifeh, Jordan and she supports five members of her family.
.
Suzan is a tailor who works from her house. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase fabrics for her business.

Suzan is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 40 year old single woman. She lives in Ashraifa, Amman, Jordan.

Mariam is looking to have a loan of 800 JOD so that she can buy more accessories, ornamental trees and gifts for trading.

loans.use: to buy more accessories, gifts and ornamental trees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchace mobile phone accessories for trading purposes.

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah is a 37 year old single woman. She lives in Al Salt, Al Balqa, Jordan.

Sabah is looking to have a laon of 600 JOD in order to buy more quantities of clothes and blankets for trading purposes. Her income will increase and she will be able to open her own store in the future.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and blankets for trading.

loans.name: Khadeeja

texts.en:
Khadeeja is a 36 year old married woman. She is the mother of 3 children. She lives in Marka, Amman, Jordan.

Khadeeja is looking to have a loan of 500 JOD in order to improve her home living conditions, paint the home and do some maintenance. It will be more healthy.

loans.use: to improve and paint her home living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a skin cleanser machine for his barber shop.

loans.name: Sana'a

texts.en:
Sana'a is a 40 year old divorced woman. She is responsible for 2 family members. She lives in Sahab, Jordan.

Sana'a is looking to have a loan of 1,000 JOD so that she can buy more clothes and accessories and perfumes for trading, so her income will increase.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and accessories and perfumes for trading.

loans.name: Fatimah

texts.en:
Fatimah is a 27 year old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan and she supports 3 members of her family. Fatimah is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet so, the man in the photo is her husband.

Fatimah is looking to improve her family's living conditions. She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase new furniture for her house. As Fatimah is under 30 years old, her loan considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for her house.

loans.name: Las Semillitas Group

texts.es: El Sr. Raúl tiene 47 años de edad,  es divorciado  y tiene 1 hija, Raúl  actualmente es socio en la alcancía comunal “Las Semillitas” grupo  conformado por  7 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio.  Raúl  trabaja desde hace 15 años en su propio taller de planchado y pintura de automóviles, este negocio surge a raíz de que Raúl trabajo 13 años en un taller como mecánico donde empezó como ayudante  y fue así donde adquirió toda la experiencia para poner su propio  negocio ,  su motivación  en todo esto  fue su hija, él sabe que empezar no era fácil pero trabajo día y noche para tener lo que hoy en día tiene,  gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación  puede pagar la universidad de su hija, el taller de su negocio es propio y hoy en día tiene una mejor calidad vida. Raúl  ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar repuestos de vehiculos. Raúl  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Raul is 47 years old, divorced and has one daughter. Currently, Raul is a partner of the communal bank ¨Las Semillas¨ (The seeds), which is made up of seven partners that make a living from commerce.

Since 15 years ago, Raul has worked in his own garage, painting cars. This idea started because he worked for 13 years in a garage, where he started as an assistant and was like this that he acquired all the experience needed to start his own garage. His inspiration in all this has been his daughter. He knew that starting a business wouldn't be easy but he worked hard, night and day to have what he has. Thanks to his effort and dedication he has been able to pay the university of his daughter, have his own business and have a better quality of life.

Raul requests a loan to buy spare parts for vehicles. Raul will achieve his goals with lot of work and effort and the loans from EDAPROSPO (Field Partner) will help him.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for vehicles

loans.name: Floresa

texts.en:
Floresa, who lives happily with her loving and industrious husband and five good children, has been engaged in the hog raising business for four years now. This business is her way of helping her husband in providing for the needs of their family. 

In order to realize her plan of growing her business, Floresa requests a loan of PHP 10,000. She will use a portion of this money to buy at least 2-3 piglets and then sell these in the market after a few months. Some of her loan will also be used to buy hog feed and the materials to build a bigger pen so that she can raise more hogs. With the expected increased income, she knows that she will be able to support the education of her five children. With the help of her husband, Floresa, who never gets tired and considers her family as her source of strength and inspiration, believes that they will eventually be uplifted from poverty.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and the materials to build a bigger pen so that she can raise more hogs.

loans.name: Avelino

texts.en:
Avelino is a diligent husband with simple dreams–to provide a better life for his family and to send their children to school. He is married to Marivic and gifted with two children. They are living in a peaceful community surrounded by agricultural land. 

Aside from selling the fruits and vegetables that he harvests in their farm, Avelino is also engaged in the buying and selling of carabao (water buffalo) and cows. This has been their sources of income for almost fifteen years now. He believes that a loan request of PHP 10,000 will enable him to generate higher profit because he will be able to buy other animals, like boars and goats, that he can sell to the nearby province. Avelino and his wife are also starting to save some of their income in preparation for the college education of their children. They also dream of improving their house in the future, when they are financially ready.

loans.use: to buy more animals, like boars and goats.

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza, married and with two children, learned by herself how to become a good entrepreneur simply by risking her money for a sari-sari business (a community based variety store). She chose to engage in this kind of business so she can still have time to keep the house clean, cook for her children and do the other household chores when there are no customers. Her store is usually open from 6:30 in the morning to 8:00 in the evening. 

Flordeliza is borrowing PHP 10,000 as additional working capital because she wants to buy more products like soft drinks, canned goods (meat loaf, corn beef, sardines), cooking oil, sugar, coffee and milk which are in great demand in her community. She knows that with a variety of products to sell, her income will increase and she can then support the education of her children. At the moment, her eldest is already in college.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, beverages and soap for her store.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Selling vegetables in their village has been Carmelita's (aged 56) business for the past 2 years. She sells tomatoes, pechay, ginger and cabbage. She is attentive on her business because this is her only way to help her husband to support their four children. As time passes, their necessities for living also grow, so she must double her efforts in selling her products. 

For this reason, Carmelita is requesting a loan of PHP 8,000 pesos to buy camote root crops, string beans and sayote as additional products to sell. She hopes to gain more profits through these goods in order for her to provide for the growing necessities of her family.

loans.use: to buy camote root crops, string beans and sayote.

loans.name: Marcial

texts.en:
Marcial is 45 years old, married and blessed with three children. To make a living, he has been growing corn for almost twenty years. He earned 30,000 Phillipine pesos (PHP) at the last cropping. 

Marcial is requesting a loan of PHP 35,000 to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for his farm business. He is determined to work hard to supplement his family's daily needs. He hopes that Kiva will continue to give him financial assistance to improve his family's status in life.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for his farm business.

loans.name: José De María

texts.es: José de María, se dedica a la agricultura, uno de los oficios más antiguos que existen en este país, y que ha permitido que muchas personas hayan  salido adelante. El vive junto a su familia en una pequeña parcela gracias a la cual puede sembrar frijoles, maíz y maicillo, granos básicos los cuales comercializa en diferentes mercados del municipio en el que reside, y así mismo su esposa le ayuda a venderlo en su casa con vecinos y amigos, destinando una pequeña cantidad para el consumo familiar. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de maíz, frijoles y maicillo para sembrar, de esta forma él espera incrementar su cosecha y así aumentar al máximo sus ventas. Es una persona muy responsable cuenta con gran cantidad de clientes, a quienes desea brindarles el mejor servicio con esta decisión tomada.
texts.en:
José de María makes a living from farming, one of the oldest activities that exists in this country, and which has allowed many people get ahead.

He lives with his family in a small lot, where he grows beans, corn, and other grains that he sells in the different municipal markets in the municipality where he lives. Equally, in the house his wife, helps him, sells to neighbors and friends, leaving some for the family consumption.

José requests a loan to INTEGRAL (Field Partner) to buy seeds of corn and beans to sow with the hope of improving his harvest and the volume of his sales. He is a very responsible person, he has a large number of customers, whom he wants to offer the best service with this taken decision.

loans.use: to buy seeds of corn and beans to sow

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is 27 years old and has been engaged in the piggery business as a source of income. She patiently does such an activity because of her two children who are currently studying. 

Jovelyn wants to increase her proceeds in order to save for the education of her children. But, she suffers from insufficiency of funds. In connection to this, she is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 to purchase the needs of her hogs, such as feeds and vitamins. She just hopes that her loan will be beneficial to her business and living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase the needs of her hog, such as feeds and vitamins.

loans.name: Madelyn

texts.en: Madelyn, 31, is a very responsible mother living with her husband and children. She has piggery business that needs funds for developing a shelter for her hogs. Due to lack of funds, she asks assistance of the lenders through ASKI. With the loan amount of PHP 10,000, she will buy cement, hollow blocks, feed and vitamins. She is grateful for the support she’s getting because she will now be able to work and make progress in her business.

loans.use: buy cement, hollow blocks, feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha operates hog fattening business as a source of income. After four to five months, she disposes of her hogs at a profitable price and earns a maximum of PHP 8,000 to save for their future use, such as emergencies. She is 56 years of age and has devoted herself in this business for 20 years.
