Now, Editha is applying for additional working capital to develop her business. A loan of PHP 15,000 will be used to buy feed, vitamins and cement to develop a shelter for her hogs. This will allow Editha to continue increasing the profit and secure a stable future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and cement to develop a shelter for her hogs.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.en:
Eduardo is 51 years old. He is married and has three children. To make a living, Eduardo owns and operates a farm raising crops, primarily planting and harvesting corn. Eduardo has been engaged in his business for over 30 years and earns approximately 40,000 PHP with his last crop. 

At this time, Eduardo wants a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for his corn farm business. He dreams that his business will become more productive so that he can give his family a progressive standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for his corn farm business.

loans.name: Zenica

texts.en: Zenica is an industrious mother who sells fish in the village. Through the income generated from her business, she is able to help provide for her family's basic needs. However, she is unable to provide for their educational needs. Consequently, she is requesting a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy more fish as additional products to sell, in order to gain higher income. With this loan, she can now sustain their needs. In the future, she hopes for her family's standard of living to improve and to be able to let her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy more fish as additional products to sell.

loans.name: Precy

texts.en:
Precy is a farmer working in the Philippines. She is 40 years old. She is married and has two children. Precy is recognized as a jolly and hard working mother. She is willing to work hard every single day to lift up her family from poor living conditions. 

Right now, Precy is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP 20,000 to buy farm inputs such as corn seeds and fertilizers to sustain her farm. She dreams that her business will become more productive so she can give her family a progressive standard of living.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as corn seeds and fertilizers to sustain her farm

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is from the village of Disimuray. He is 32 years old, married, and has two children. To make a living, Robert plants and harvests corn for sale. He has been engaged in his business for 25 years and earns approximately 30,000 PHP with his last crop. His wife also manages their hog raising business for additional income. 

At this time, Robert wants to avail himself of a loan for PHP 35,000 to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to supplement his farm business. He hopes that KIVA lenders will continue assisting him in the business so that he can further improve it and support his family with basic necessities.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and insecticides to supplement his farm business.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is forty years old and lives in Bagong Silang with her husband and four grown-up children. She describes herself as a hard worker and one who wants to move her family ahead in life. For about the last three years, she has been working as a housekeeper, doing all types of work. 

The loan that Virginia is requesting is for the purchase of wood and other materials needed in wood lamination to allow her to do a better job. By purchasing these items, she will improve the quality of her work and have more customers. Her dream is to have her own premises to set up her carpentry shop in a better way, and to help her family financially.

loans.use: to buy wood and glue for wood lamination.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 43 years old. She lives in her own home with her life partner and three grown-up children. She has a wood lamination business that she attends to every day with dedication and kindness. Marilyn's business is located in a very rural area, where she is surrounded by many farms. In addition to this business, she has her own corn farm. Marilyn is an exemplary woman who never tires of working despite her advanced age. 

Marilyn has decided to request a loan of 11,000 PHP so that her business will become stronger. She needs the loan to invest in the purchase of wood, glue, and other products needed for wood lamination. In this way, she hopes to improve her sales, her quality of life, and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy wood and materials for her wood lamination business.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en: Avelina is 51 years old and married with six children. She lives in the province of Isabela, which is a beautiful place. The people there raise animals and farm. Avelina's husband works as a farmer, and the house they live in is their property. Avelina works as a furniture maker, and that is why she is asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP for her furniture business. Aside from the furniture business, she raises chickens and pigs, which she sells in the community. Her goal is to grow her furniture business.

loans.use: to buy a planer, wood and nails for her furniture business.

loans.name: Freddie

texts.en: Freddie is 35 years old and married. He has been growing corn for 15 years. His net income for the last growing season was 35,000 PHP. Freddie does his best to meet his family's needs. He works hard every single day to provide for the needs of his children. Now, Freddie is requesting a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase seedlings and fertilizer for his farm. He hopes that he can get the amount he requested.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en: Gregorio, 46 years old, is married. He has been growing corn for almost 20 years. Last growing season, his net income was 40,000 Philippine pesos (PHP). Gregorio is asking for a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for his farm. Future loans from Kiva would be invaluable to him, as he sees the loans as the only opportunity for the progression of his business and financial security.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Gerry

texts.en: Gerry lives with his family in the village of Disimuray. He is 42 years old and a father of five children. Some of his children are currently in school. Gerry is a farmer who grows corn. He has 30 years of experience in this field, and, through his harvests, he manages to provide food for his family's needs. At this time, Gerry is requesting a loan of 50,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and seedlings for his farming business. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to pay his children's tuition fees.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Ever since Marcelina, 40 years old, was very little, she has really liked the art of welding. That is why she thought of having her own business, making gates and windows. Her husband and daughter help her with the business, specifically with customer relations. 

Marcelina does her work with great enthusiasm and dedication. In order to continue with her business, she wants a loan to buy hoses and a welding machine for her welding shop. Her big dream is to have a well-established business and a good quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy hoses and a welding machine.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.en: Alfonso is single and operates a farm as a source of income. He has been in this occupation for over ten years. He is asking for a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to buy insecticides, fertilizer and corn seeds to support his corn production. He hopes that this loan will help him grow his business in order to provide his parents with a good life, especially as they get older. He is eager to work hard in order to save for his parents and future family.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fertilizer and corn seeds.

loans.name: Nelia

texts.en: Nelia is 52 years old, married and has three children. To earn a living, Nelia is involved in the farming business. She has been in this business for over twenty years. She gained 12,000 PHP from her last crop. Now, she is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase corn seeds and fertilizers. She hopes that the lenders will continue providing financial assistance in order to help many farmers. Hopefully, with her hard work and the loan, Nelia will have a profitable harvest this coming harvest season.

loans.use: to purchase corn seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a farmer from Baculud, Iguig. She is married to Placido, and they both manage a hectare plot of land on which they plant and cultivate rice. They have been in their farming business for over ten years and earn 9,000 PHP, twice a year, during the harvest season. It pays for their meals and bills at home. Edna and Placido have seven children. Their children have their own families now but sometimes rely on Edna and Placido in times of need. 

Edna is hoping to ensure the good growth of her crops and is now borrowing to have additional capital of 10,000 PHP to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides for use in farming. This will help ensure the good growth of her crops, leading her to offer them at a good price to traders. She also promises to pay back her loan in full. 

In the future, Edna hopes to make the business more profitable in order to earn funds to invest in a hog raising business and boost her profits.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides for use in farming.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 57 years old, married, and has ten children. Five of them already got married while the rest still attend school. Despite the large family she has, she is still very happy to meet all their needs. She is thankful for having a responsible husband who is her partner in achieving a better life for the family. Her spouse is a farmer while she is raising hogs to fatten and breed and in the future sell them to butchers in their village. This way, they generate about PHP 9,000 each month. It is just enough for their sustenance.

She would like to increase her sales and is asking for a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy feed and vaccines for the hogs sustainability. It will help ensure good nutrition for the hogs and lead her to offer them at a good price and boost her profits too.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs sustainability

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a farmer in Kitale, age 35 and married. He has two children with the first born already attending school.  

He has been in farming for 15 years and currently sells his farm produce, which includes maize, beans and peas, to the local market.

Moses has requested a loan of 62,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He says there is  ready market for milk and the milk produce will also be used to supplement the family's basic needs. His main desire remains giving his children good education and he has every hope he will succeed with effective farming.

He says that the poor roads network in the region remains a challenge to many farmers but he is optimistic his transport business which he carries out besides farming to supplement farming income will really mitigate the challenges of high transport costs many farmers have to contend with. He too appreciates Juhudi Kilimo's efficiency in loan processing.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Zabulon

texts.en: Zabron is a forty-year-old-man with eight children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. For four years he has been operating a retail shop and the business is very profitable, despite challenges with price fluctuations. However, his personal goal is to educate his children to higher institutional levels and his business goal is to move his business to a more permanent location. The purpose of the loan is to buy more plastic chairs and plastic buckets to sell.

loans.use: to buy  plastic chairs and buckets for sell.

loans.name: Raúl Alfonso

texts.es: Raúl Alfonso vive junto a su compañera de vida Milagro y su hija, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, hasta ahora el negocio le ha dado muy buenos resultados ya se hizo de mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; Raúl es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y sobre todo humilde, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan superarse y llegar al éxito; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para compra de material por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc. Raúl Alonso tiene buenas referencias crediticias y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Raul Alfonso lives with his life partner Milagro and daughter. He has a metal structures shop that makes doors, balconies, and fences among other things. He has spent many years working in this business and has a lot of experience that helps him improve his work every day. Up to now, the business has provided very good results and he has a lot of clients that seek the quality of his work at reasonable prices, but above all, because he always makes the work to his clients' liking. 

Raul is hard-working man, honest and above all, very humble. He is always on the lookout for new opportunities that allow him to excel and achieve success. He wants to grow his business but needs the capital to buy the materials and therefore he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy iron, metal, tools, etc. Raul Alfonso has great credit references and is certain that he will be able to pay off the debt while taking home financial security.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal, and tools.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Rigoberto vive junto a su madre y su hermano con quienes trabaja sembrando granos básicos, Rigoberto es un hijo muy responsable y trabajador  quien mientras espera que su cosecha este lista trabaja en una granja de crianza de aves con lo que puede obtener dinero extra. Rigoberto al igual que muchos agricultores también sufrió grandes pérdidas después de las fuertes tormentas que se dieron hace un año en el país, por lo que solicita un préstamo para poder comprar frijoles y maíz para iniciar una vez más la siembra en sus parcelas, así mismo comprar pesticidas y abono para las plantas. Realizar un buen trabajo es muy importante para Rigoberto ya que es la actividad que le permite a él y a su familiar salir adelante.
texts.en:
Rigoberto lives with his mother and brother, with whom he works planting staple crops. Rigoberto is a very responsible and hard-working son who, while waiting for his harvest, is prepared to work on a farm raising chickens so he can earn some extra money. 

Rigoberto, like many farmers, suffered large losses after the strong storms experienced in the country one year ago. Because of this, he is asking for a loan to buy beans and corn in order to begin sowing seeds again on his land, and also to buy pesticides and fertilizer for the plants. Doing a good job is very important for Rigoberto, since it is what will allow him and his family to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy seeds to cultivate

loans.name: Salvador Guillermo

texts.es: Salvador Guillermo de 65 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, quienes trabajan con él. Salvador se dedica a la siembra de frijoles y maíz para posteriormente venderlos. Salvador es un señor muy responsable a quien le gusta dar calidad en sus productos, razón por la que cuenta con gran cantidad de clientes. Él desea invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de abono y semillas para sembrar, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual espera lograr un aumento de ventas y así mismo obtener nuevos clientes de manera que pueda ganar lo más posible con su trabajo, ya que solo de esta forma podrá contar con una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Salvador Guillermo is 65 years old, and lives with his wife and children, who work with him. Salvador works planting beans and corn in order to sell them later. He is a very responsible man who likes to offer quality products, which is why he has a large number of customers. 

He wants to invest in buying more fertilizer and seeds to sow, which is why he is applying for a loan through INTEGRAL. Through this loan, he hopes to achieve greater sales, and at the same time gain new customers so that he can earn as much as possible with his work, since this is the only way he can have improved economic stability.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to harvest corn and beans.

loans.name: Shagufta's Group

texts.en:
Shagufta is a 36-year-old woman. To supplement her family's income, she sews clothes for her neighboring customers. She is very talented and can sew designer and non-designer dresses very easily. Her customers are very satisfied with her quality of work and they keep on giving her orders every month. 

Shagufta's husband operates a timber sales business. It is located in the market, where he serves many customers every day and earns a good income. He has been in this profession for 10 years and in these years he has been able to successfully expand his business. With this loan, he will be able to further expand his business by buying timber in larger quantities for selling. Shagufta is very hopeful about his business success after this loan.

loans.use: To buy timber for timber sales business

loans.name: Mukarram

texts.ru: Мукаррам женщина 32 лет,замужем,имеет 2 детей.С юных лет шьет национальную женскую одежду и занимается производством национальных сундуков.Этим ремеслом занимаются ее родители уже много лет.Она помогает им в производстве.В основном шьет женскую одежду.Ее клиенты девочки от 5 до 65 лет.У нее очень много клиентов.Ее муж работает в банке, охранником.Помогает в производстве сундуков. Она очень ответственная,пунктуальная женщина.С 2011 года кредитуется в нашей организации.На полученный кредит хочет приобрести несколько рулонов тканей для пошива женской одежды.Она благодарна нашей организации и надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Mukarram is a 32 year old woman and is married.  She has two children.  Since early childhood, she has sewn traditional women's clothing and she works in producing traditional chests and trunks.  Her parents have been practicing this craft for many years.  She helps them with their production.  Her primary work is sewing women's clothing.  Her clients are women from 5 to 65 years old.  She has very many clients.  Her husband is a bank security guard.  He helps with making the chests and trunks.  

Mukarram is a very responsible, punctual woman.  She has been borrowing from our organization since 2011.  With her loan, Mukarram wants to buy several bolts of fabric for sewing women's clothing.  She is grateful to our organization and is relying on your support.

loans.use: purchase of fabrics for women's clothing

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de 41 vive junto a su madre de muy avanzada edad, quien depende por completo de Francisco. El es un hijo muy responsable y trabajador quien se dedica a la siembra de maíz para darle todo lo necesario a su madre y así contar con una vida estable. Francisco solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar toda la materia prima para darles los cuidados necesarios a su siembra, materia como: pesticidas y abono. Con esto él espera brindar mucha más calidad en sus productos y así aumentar sus ventas, las cuales las realiza en diferentes tiendas. Francisco cuenta con muchos clientes a quienes desea mantener y así mismo obtener nuevos, razón por la que el siempre desea dar lo mejor, lo que puede lograr gracias al préstamo obtenido de INTEGRAL.
texts.en:
Francisco, 41 years old, lives with his aging mother, who completely depends on Francisco. He is a very responsible and hard-working son who makes a living growing corn in order to give everything necessary to his mother and have a stable life. Francisco is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, with which he will be able to buy all of the basic supplies for giving the necessary care to his crops, such as pesticides and fertilizer. 

With this loan he hopes to provide products of much better quality and therefore improve his sales, which he carries out in different stores. Francisco has many customers who he wants to maintain and at the same time obtain new ones. For that reason, he always wants to give the best, which he can achieve thanks to the loan obtained from INTEGRAL.

loans.use: to buy basic necessities for the sowing of beans and corn

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es: Gilberto vive junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, y junto a dos hijas. Desde hace 23 años atrás que Gilberto se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos, los cuales también vende en diferentes lugares de la zona en que reside. Este es un trabajo bastante pesado, lo que no le impide a Gilberto realizarlo ya que es más grande su deseo por salir adelante y brindarle todo lo necesario a su familia. El solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda obtener el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de frijoles y maíz para sembrar, lo que es de mucha importancia para él ya que la temporada de siembra esta casi por terminar y Gilberto desea mucho duplicar la cantidad de semilla que siembra normalmente, ya que tiene como meta incrementar las ventas de granos básicos y de esta forma aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Gilberto lives with his wife, who spends her time doing the household chores, and his two daughters.  For 23 years Gilberto has made a living planting basic grains, which he also sells in different places in the area where he lives.  This is fairly tough work but it doesn’t stop Gilberto from fulfilling his greatest wish, which is to get ahead and provide for all of his family’s needs.  

He is asking for a loan from Integral, with which he can obtain the necessary money to invest in the purchase of beans and corn to plant.  This is very important to him because the planting season is already almost over and Gilberto very much wants to double the quantity of seeds that he normally plants.  His goal is to increase his sales of basic grains and in this way increase his earnings.

loans.use: to buy beans and corn to plant

loans.name: Mujeres Dinamicas Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de mujeres con iniciativa y buenas propuestas de cómo hacer negocio hoy en día, son las mujeres del grupo llamado Mujeres Dinámicas,  conformado por  7 socias. Este grupo comienza a dar marcha hace ya 15 años trabajando con nosotros. Mujeres que con esfuerzo salen a delante sin importar las adversidades que vengan en el camino. Muestra de ello es la señora Juana la presidenta, de 37 años de edad casada y con dos hijos a un menores de edad, ella sale adelante cada día dándole empeño y esmero a su negocio, ella se dedica a la preparación de eventos y buffet y en este trabajo tiene más de 3 años, también se dedica a la venta de uniformes para colegios en época escolar, en el futuro le gustaría poner un local propio para sus ventas de repostería porque cada día crece más. El presente préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de equipos de repostería. La señora Juana está sentada, viste una casaca ploma y un polo fucsia.
*En la parte inferior izquierda de la fotografía con casaca marrón se encuentra la Sra. Gloria y en la parte inferior derecha con casaca negra la Sra. Rosario.
texts.en:
The women of the group called Mujeres Dinámicas, made up of seven members, have initiative and good proposals on how to do business today. This group began working with us fifteen years ago. They are women whom with effort continue forward without concerning themselves with the adversity that comes in their path. 

One example of this is Juana, the president, who is 37 years old, married and with two children who are minors. She perseveres each day with commitment and care for her business. She makes a living planning events and buffets, a job which she has done for more than three years. She also makes a living through the sale of school uniforms during the school year. In the future she would like to set up her own place to sell pastries because her business grows more every day. She will invest this loan in the purchase of pastry equipment. 

On the left hand side of the photo is Sra. Gloria in the maroon shirt, and on the right hand side in the black shirt is Sra. Rosario.

loans.use: to buy pastry making equipment.

loans.name: Administradoras 2012 Group

texts.es:
Bertha Marilú de 21 años de edad, se caracteriza por ser dentro del grupo una chica muy entusiasta y emprendedora, es socia de la alcancía comunal LAS ADMINISTRADORAS 2012 conformada por jóvenes universitarias en su mayoría,  ella estudia en una universidad particular de su localidad y para poder educarse, Marilú trabaja en una distribuidora de equipos celulares como asistente de ventas. Ella decidió invertir el préstamo  en la compra de equipos y accesorios para teléfonos celulares que lo expenderá en la tienda donde también trabaja, y  así generarse un ingreso adicional para poder auto educarse. Marilú se encuentra en la parte central de la fotografía, ella viste con un polo color blanco y pantalón de color beige.
* En la parte superior derecha de la fotografía se encuentra la srta. Erica.
texts.en:
Bertha Marilú is 21 years old and is characterized within her group as a very enthusiastic and enterprising girl. She is a member of the communal bank Las Administradoras 2012, which is made up of university student youth for the most part.  She studies in a private university in her town and in order to be able to educate herself, Marilú works in a cell phone equipment distribution company as a sales assistant.  

She decided to invest the loan in the purchase of equipment and accessories for cell phones that she will sell in the store where she also works and so generate an additional income to be able to educate herself.  Marilú is in the center of the photograph. She is dressed in a white polo shirt and beige pants.  *In the upper right part of the photograph is Ms. Erica.

loans.use: to buy accessories and equipment for cell phones

loans.name: Las Dos Amigas Group

texts.es: Martha tiene 44 años de edad, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Las Dos Amigas, es casada y tiene tres hijos, su esposo se dedica al comercio, ellos residen en la comunidad de Concordia, Campamento, Olancho. Ella se dedica a la venta de granos básicos, inicio su negocio por iniciativa propia desde hace cinco años que se dedica a esta actividad, Martha en temporada de cosecha compra granos en grandes cantidades y los almacena para poder vender en la temporada de escases de los granos. Ella solicita el préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de maíz y frijoles para mantener surtido su negocio. Con la ayuda de este préstamo ella podrá seguir apoyando a sus hijos y a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, ya que obtendrá ganancias de la venta de su producto. Su meta es poder tener una bodega de compra y venta de granos básicos en su comunidad. Es su tercer financiamiento que obtiene Martha en FAMA y ha cumplido puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Martha is 44 years old and is a member of the solidarity group Las Dos Amigas. She is married and has three children. Her husband works in trade, and they live in the community of Concordia, Campamento, Olancho. She works selling basic grains. She started her business on her own initiative and has been doing this activity for five years. During harvest time, Martha buys grains in large quantities and stores them in order to be able to sell them during times of grain shortages. 

She is applying for the loan to invest it in buying corn and beans to keep her business stocked. With the help of this loan, she will be able to continue helping her children and husband with household expenses, since she will make a profit from the sale of her product. Her goal is to be able to have a small store that buys and sells basic grains in her community. This is the third loan Martha has received from FAMA and she has made her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn and beans

loans.name: Rudy

texts.es: Rudy de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su familia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado cerca de su casa; comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene clientela fija las personas lo prefieren por la calidad del producto, por los precios,  y sobre todo por el buen servicio; Rudy es un hombre muy agradable, muy trabajador, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que se le presenten y que le ayuden a consolidar su éxito, desde hace algún tiempo se decidió en aumentar la producción y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, y frijol, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. Rudy tiene buenas capacidades  de pago y es responsable, tiene la certeza de que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida,
texts.en:
Rudy is 28 years old and lives with his family. He works growing corn and beans and has years of experience in agriculture, which enable him to obtain  the best harvests. His farmland is located near his home and he does business in all the surrounding areas.  He already has an established group of customers who prefer the quality of his products, the prices, and above all, the excellent service. 

Rudy is a very friendly and hard-working man, always looking for new opportunities to help him succeed further. A while ago, Rudy decided to increase production and needs to invest in materials. Because of this, he is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc. Rudy is responsible and has a good ability to pay, so he is sure that he will be able to pay off the loan and also give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, and tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es: Rocío pertenece al grupo “ROSA MISTICA”, conformado por 08 socios, Roció se caracteriza por ser la más alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta del grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de cristalería (vasos, copas, adornos, etc.) y también eventualmente vende frazadas, que los ofrece en las ferias y mercados locales,  de manera ambulatoria; ella es madre soltera y tiene dos pequeños hijos, que son el motor de su vida, es por eso que ella decidió pertenecer a esta alcancía comunal e invertir el préstamo solicitado en la compra mas mercadería (vasos, copas, floreros, ceniceros y otros), para poder sacar adelante a sus  2 pequeños hijos. En la fotografía Rocío es la segunda de la izquierda de la fila posterior; viste con un polo de color rosado y en sus brazos carga a la menor de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Rocío belongs to the group "Rosa Mistica", which is made up of eight members. Rocío is characterized for being the happiest, hardest worker and most enthusiastic of the group. She makes a living selling crystal products (glasses, cups, decorations, etc) and now also sells blankets which she offers when traveling among the local markets and fairs. 

She is a single mother and has two small children who are the driving force of her life. It is for that reason that she decided to join to this communal bank and invest the loan sought in purchasing more merchandise (glasses, cups, vases, ashtrays and others) in order to bring up her two small children. 

In the photograph, Rocío is the second from the left in the back row, dressed in a pink polo shirt and with her youngest  of her children in her arms.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Xuyen's Group

texts.en:
Xuyen was born in 1958. Her husband passed away and she is living with her son who is now working as a welder. At present, Mrs Xuyen sells fish and raises chickens for a living. She has been working in this field for five years. Each month, she can earn about 4,000,000 Dong (VND). Mrs Xuyen has participated in the credit program of SEDA since 2007. For this loan, she would like to borrow 8,502,000 VND in order to develop her business. Her group consists of two persons.

Xuyen is 52 years old and she has one child. She owns a grocery store. In this loan, she needs a loan of 6,322,000 VND so as to buy more goods for sale.

loans.use: to develop her selling fish business in the market

loans.name: Fahmeyeh

texts.en:
Fahmeyeh is a 42-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan.  She is supporting 4 members of her family.
Fahmeyeh is looking to improve her family living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 400 JD to do maintenance for her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance for her house

loans.name: Nael

texts.en: Nael is 31 years old and single; he lives in Sana'a, Yemen. Nael has a business selling honey and natural oils in the municipal market where he lives. His business is located very strategically, in a very busy place. Many people give him good references, and they say they are very satisfied with the service that he offers. He is a very fair and hardworking man. Because the income earned through his work is not sufficient to cover his household expenses, and also because many times his business doesn't have the best sales because at times he lacks sufficient merchandise to satisfy his customer's needs, he has decided to increase his business inventory.  He is applying for a loan of 150000 YER from AMB to buy more honey and natural oils to meet more of the demand. This will allow him to increase his earnings.  He hopes to get good results that will allow him to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to increase his business inventory of honey and natural oils

loans.name: Dolores Ivonne

texts.es: Dolores tiene 48 años y se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogos y comidas rápidas. Vive en Libertad en la casa de sus padres ya que es separada. Tiene un hijo que asiste al colegio fiscal y es por el que tiene dos negocios. Nos comenta que siempre a vendido productos de belleza ya que le gusta tener dinero para cubrir sus gastos, adicional le da tiempo de cuidar a su hijo. Esto lo realiza todos los días visitando a familiares y amigos ofertando perfumes, cremas, lapiz labiales, desodorantes en la mañana y tarde. Dolores nos cuenta que a pesar de esta hubo un tiempo que necesitaba ingresos y como su familia le decía que cocinaba rico decidió empezar a vender comida preparada. Antes lo hacía solo a conocidos y bajo pedido pero no le dejaba mucha ganancia. Hace 1 año decidió hacerlo para el público y ha tenido muy buenos resultados. Esto solo lo realiza en las noches porque vende meriendas, el puesto lo saca en la parte frontal de su casa. Dolores nos comenta que como ambos negocios los realiza sola su mayor preocupación seria enfermarse ya que se paralizaría ambos negocios y no tendría con que cubrir sus gastos. Espera no verse en ese problema ya que necesita el prestamo  para comprar productos como perfumes, maquillaje, desodorante, sombras etc., invertira en este negocio porque es con el que tiene mayor rentabilidad y podria cubrir las cuotas. La meta de Dolores es poder comprar una vitrina donde exponer los productos que vende.
texts.en:
Dolores is 48 years old.  She sells cosmetics through catalogs and fast food.  Dolores lives in Libertad at the home of her parents since she is already separated from her spouse.  She has a son who attends a state school, which is why she manages two businesses.  Dolores says that she has always sold beauty products because she likes having income to cover her expenses, but it also gives her time to take care of her son.  Every day she visits with relatives and friends in the mornings and afternoons to offer them perfumes, crèmes, lip pencils, and deodorants.  Despite the time that is required of her to generate needed income, Dolores says she decided to begin selling prepared foods because her family said that her cooking was delicious.  

At first Dolores only sold to people she knew, which resulted in few orders and very little profit.  A year ago, she decided to sell to the public and now has very good results.  At night she works alone selling snacks from a stand set up in front of her house.  Dolores says she operates her two businesses by herself, so her greatest worry is that a serious illness would paralyze both ventures and she would have no means of covering her expenses.  She hopes to avoid this problem and expects to secure her loan and cover all the required payments.  Dolores hopes to invest in products for her business, such as perfumes, makeup, deoderant, powder, etc. She will invest in this business because it is the most profitable and she can cover her expenses. Dolores' goal is to be able to purchase a glass case to display the items that she sells.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, crèmes, lip pencils, and deodorants.

loans.name: Lluvia De Bendiciones Group

texts.es:
El grupo lluvia de bendiciones lo conforman cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras  una de ellas es Blanca Rosa quien es casada tiene dos hijos pero solo el menor de 18 años de edad  el cual estudia depende ella. El negocio lo inicio hace 7 años con el comercio de ropa nueva y usada  luego con las ganancias instalo una pequeña pulpería.
Los otros integrantes son María Mercedes quien vende productos naturales desde hace 27 años, Miriam quien vende nacatamales desde hace 5 años y cervezas hace 2 años, y Tatiana quien vende ropa y con su marido tiene una carpintería.
texts.en:
The group Lluvia de Bendiciones [Rain of Blessings] is comprised of four workers and entrepreneurs, one of which is Blanca Rosa. She is married with two children but only one is under 18 year old and their studies depend on her. The business began 7 years ago with the sale of new and used clothing. Later, with the earnings, she opened a convenience store. 

The other members are María Mercedes who has been selling natural products for the last 27 years, Miriam who has been selling Nicaraguan tamales for five years and beer for two years; and Tatiana who sells clothing with her husband who has a carpenter's workshop.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables and meat

loans.name: Prosperidad Group

texts.es:
El grupo Prosperidad lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es María Concepción quien tiene una tortillería desde hace 7 años la cual inicio con su ahorros y poco a poco lo ha ido creciendo. Ella invertirá el crédito en reparaciones de la tortillería en especial el fogón y materiales (maíz y leña).
Las otras integrantes son Yolanda quien tiene una pulpería desde hace 5 años y Norma quien tiene un salón de belleza.
texts.en:
The Prosperidad group is made up of three hardworking and enterprising people. One of them is María Concepción, who has had a tortilla shop for 7 years. She started the shop with her savings and little by little she has grown it. She will invest the loan in repairs for the tortilla shop, especially the stove, and to purchase materials (corn and firewood). 

The other group members are Yolanda, who has had a convenience store for 5 years, and Norma, who has a beauty salon.

loans.use: to invest in repairing a stove and materials (corn and firewood)

loans.name: Los Girasoles Group

texts.es:
El Sr. Carrlos, de 34 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos pequeños, él es socio de l grupo "Los Girasoles" formado por siete socios, residentes del distrito de Carabayllo.
El Sr Carrlos, se dedica desde hace dos años a la preparación y venta de Chifa; en un espacio de su domicilio ha implementado su pequeña cocina y unas mesas con sillas para poder atener a su clientela.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá para la compra de pintura para mejorar su local, asi como también invertirá en la compra de utensilios y algunos insumos que pueda tener en stock.
texts.en:
Carrlos is 34 years old and has 3 small children.  He is a member of the group "Los Girasoles" [The Sunflowers] that consists of seven members who are residents of the district of Carabayllo.  For two years, Carrlos has made a living making and selling Chinese food.  In a space in his home, he installed a small kitchen and some tables with chairs in order to service his customers.  

He will use the loan received to invest in paint to improve the premises as well as to invest in utensils and some supplies that he can have in stock.

loans.use: to improve the atmosphere where he sells chinese food.

loans.name: Avanzando Hacia Un Futuro Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Nicolaza, tiene 54 años, 2 hijos mayores, por los que se ha sacrificado mucho para poder sacarlos adelante. Ella es socia del grupo "Avanzando hacia un Futuro" formado por 8 socios, residentes del distrito de Comas, ellos decidieron ponerle el nombre del grupo por ser una característica de los integrantes el trabajar mucho para poder forjarse un futuro p´rospero.
Desde hace dos años, la Sra. Nicolaza trabaja en la venta de calzado, éste es un negocio familiar, ella realiza su trabajo en una avenida muy comercial lo que le permite tener mayores ventas.
El préstano recibido lo invertirá en la compra de calzado para poder aumentar su stock.
texts.en:
Nicolaza is 54 years old and has two adult children, and has sacrificed much to bring them up properly. She is a member of the group "Avanzando hacia un Futuro" (Advancing toward a future), a group of eight members who are residents of the Comas district. They decided on the name of the group because it is characteristic of the members to work hard in order to build a successful future for themselves. 

For two years, Nicolaza has worked selling footwear, which is a family business. She conducts business on a very commercial street, which allows her to have better sales. She will invest this loan in the purchase of footwear to increase her stock.

loans.use: to purchase footwear to increase her stock.

loans.name: Damasco Group

texts.es:
El grupo Damasco es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora una de ellas es Ivania de 42 años quien se dedica al comercio desde ropa, alimentos y nacatamales desde hace 6 años e invertirá el crédito en negocio. Ella tiene un hijo de 17 años quien está estudiando contabilidad.
La otras integrantes son Emerita quien vende ropa, sandalia y repostería desde hace 10 años y Silvia quien tiene una pulpería desde hace 5 años.
texts.en:
The Damasco group is one of hardworking and enterprising women. One of them is Ivania who is 42 years old and has sold clothing, food, and Nicaraguan tamales for 6 years. She will invest the loan in her business. She also has a 17 year old son who is studying accounting. 

The other members are Emerita who sells clothing, sandals, and pastries for 10 years, and Silvia who has had a grocery store for 5 years.

loans.use: to buy corn, pork, basic grains, meat and clothes

loans.name: Las Escogidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Escogidas lo conforman cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Iris Nubia quien se dedica a la venta de tortillas, cosa de horno y pan desde hace 20 años. Ella invertirá el crédito en maíz, harina, queso y leña. 
Las otras integrantes son María quien vende leña y frijoles, además  lava y planchas; Esmelda vende ropa y Rosa realiza y vende cepillos de lavar ropa y de lustrar.
texts.en:
The group Las Escogidas is made up of four hardworking and enterprising women.  One of them is Iris Nubia who, for 20 years, has made a living selling tortillas, baked goods and bread.  She will invest the loan in corn, flour, cheese and firewood.  

The other members are María, who sells firewood and beans and also does washing and ironing; Esmelda, who sells clothing; and Rosa, who makes and sells brushes for washing clothes and polishing.

loans.use: to buy corn, flour, cheese and firewood.

loans.name: Shalon Group

texts.es:
El grupo Shalon está conformado por tres personas trabajadora y emprendedora  una de ellas es Manuela quien se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y usada desde hace cuatro años. Ella junto a uno de sus hijos comercializa en los departamentos dichos productos.
El crédito lo invertirá en mercadería en ropa en especial femenina.
Las otras integrantes son Keila quien vende comida y ropa desde hace 3 años y Rosa quien desde hace 20 años empezó reparando ropa actualmente  realiza ropa desde camisas, gabachas, faldas…etc. y  comercializa perfumes, bisutería y perfumes hace 4 años.
texts.en:
The Shalon Group [Shalom Group] is comprised of three hard-working entrepreneurs. One of these women is Manuela, who has sold new and used clothing for the past four years. Together with one of her children, she sells such products throughout different regions. Her loan will be invested in clothing merchandise, especially women's clothing. 

The other group members are Keyla, who has sold food and clothing for the past three years, and Rosa, who began mending clothes 20 years ago and currently makes shirts, overalls, skirts, etc. She also has sold perfume and miscellaneous accessories for the past four years.

loans.use: to buy clothing merchandise, particularly women's clothes.

loans.name: Mana Group

texts.es:
El grupo Maná lo conforman cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Karla de 38 años quien tiene una pequeña venta desde hace 3 años. Ella tiene dos hijos de 20 y 15 años de edad siendo la menor la que depende de ella, estudia y le ayuda en el negocio.
Las otras son Susana quien vende fríjoles cocidos, químicos y mercadería en general, Gladys quien vende fresco, helado y mercadería; y Nely quien tiene una pulpería desde hace 9 años.
texts.en:
The Maná group is made up of four hardworking and enterprising people, one of whom is Karla. She is 38 years old and has had a small shop for three years. She has two children aged 20 and 15. The youngest, who is still dependent on her, is studying and helps with the business.

The others are Susana, who sells cooked beans, chemicals, and general merchandise; Gladys who sells drinks, ice cream and merchandise; and Nely who has had a small grocery store for nine years.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, meat, etc.

loans.name: Tauaiupolu

texts.en: Tauaiupolu is 46 years old and married with four children. She makes and sells printed materials to earn a living and has been doing this for many years. Tauaiupolu has requested a loan to to buy paints, materials, and stencils. She plans to use her profits to expand her business. She joined SPBD in 2008 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy paints, materials, and stencils.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ravshanbek

texts.ru: Равшанбек трудолюбивый,умный мужчина в возрасте 45 лет,имеет пятерых детей.В поисках источника дохода 19 лет назад он начал свой бизнес  на продовольственном рынке.С тех пор год за годом у него расширяется бизнес.На полученный доходы он отремонтировал дом,оплатил учебы своих детей и купил магазин.Он всегда мечтал обучить своих детей в учебных заведениях и у него это получилась благодаря таким финансовым организациям как "Арванд". На очередной кредит он хочет приобрести продовольственные товары и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Ravshanbek is a hard-working, intelligent man 45 years of age. He has five children. 19 years ago, while looking for a source of income, Ravshanbek set up his own business at the food market. The business grew steadily year after year. Using his profits, Ravshanbek was able to repair his home, pay for his children's education, and buy his own store. He has always dreamed of giving his children a good education, and is now able to do it thanks to financial organizations such as MDO Arvand. Ravshanbek would like to use this loan to increase his merchandise turnover during the summer season.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventory and increase merchandise turnover in his food shop

loans.name: Thap

texts.en:
Thap is 38 years old. She has two children. They are learning at primary school. 

She has a small phone store at home. She earns from it 3,000,000 VND a month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. The last cycle, she borrowed 9,184,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 9,632,000 VND to enlarge her business. Then, she hopes her business will earn enough money for her children’s education fee.

loans.use: to buy more phones to sell

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es:
La Sra. Ana Luisa desea brindar una mejor protección a sus hijos por la inseguridad desea colocar la barda delantera de su casa, esto le ayudara a tener mas protección y seguridad.
Ana luisa es divorciada y junto a sus dos hijos ha logrado sus objetivos, su propósito es dejar un patrimonio para sus hijos. Ella es costurera y realiza vestidos para una tienda en otra ciudad, pero al igual tiene un taller pequeño en su casa en donde genera ingresos extras, para su hogar.
texts.en:
Ana Luisa would like to offer her children more protection: due to a lack of safety she wants to build a wall in front of her house which will help to have more protection and security. 

Ana Luisa is divorced, and along with her two children, she has achieved her goals,  her aim is to leave her children an inheritance. She is a seamstress and she makes clothes for a store in another city, but at the same time, she has a small workshop in her home where she generates an additional income for the household.

loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Roland

texts.en: To make a living, Roland has operated his general store for more than one year. He earns a net profit of approximately 6,000 PHP monthly in this business. His profit is being rolled into revolving capital to maintain the business. Roland is 36 years old, and is married and has two children. To expand his retail operation, he is taking out this loan of PHP 20,000 to buy additional stock such as canned goods, groceries, noodles, shampoo, and spices to sell. Roland hopes to further grow his general store and to increase his income, which will secure his family's future and the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy additional stock such as canned goods, groceries, noodles, shampoo, and spices to sell.

loans.name: Papavao

texts.en:
Papavao is a 45-year-old married woman with two children.  She has a small plantation and grows bananas, taro, taamu, etc., to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. Papavao has requested a loan to buy things such as manure, gramoxone, plant sprayers, and bush knives for her business.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2010. With her profits, Papavao hopes to earn more money to help her family's income and to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase things such as manure, gramoxone, plant sprayers, and bush knives for her business.

loans.name: Tafaoga

texts.en: Tafaoga is 33 years old and married with 5 children. She owns and operates a small store, selling items such as daily used goods. She has been doing this for 3 years. Tafaoga needs a loan to buy noodles, sugar, salt, flour, cigarettes, soft drinks, vailima beers, toilet paper and snacks. She hopes to use her profits to expand business. She became a member of SPBD in 2009 to gain access to capital for her business.

loans.use: to buy noodles,sugar,salt ,flour,cigarettes,softdrinks,vailima beers,toilet papers and snacks

loans.name: Pelenatete

texts.en: Pelenatete is a 36-year-old woman who is married with 3 children. She plans to start a small business offering taxi services to the public. Pelenatete needs a loan to purchase new tires, seat covers, and a floor mat and to pay the vehicle registration renewal fees. She will use her profits to maintain good quality and provide better services. Pelenatete joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to purchase new tires, seat covers, and a floor mat and to pay the vehicle registration renewal fees

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 27 years old and single with 1 child. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for 1 year. Mary has requested a loan to buy flour, cooking oil, sugar, and baking soda. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Mary will help her family expand the business.

loans.use: to buy flour, cooking oil, sugar, and baking soda

loans.name: Violetsonnia

texts.en:
Violetsonnia is 25 years old and married with three children. 

She has a small garden where she grows cabbages, tomatoes, and cucumbers that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for five years. Violetsonnia needs a loan to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, gloves and a spade for her garden. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. Violetsonnia will use the profits from her sales to improve her vegetable garden business.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seeds, a rake, gloves and a spade.

loans.name: The 15Th Group Of Yen Hau

texts.en:
The 15th group of Yen Hau, Yen Phong commune, Bac Ninh province includes five women. 

Van is the leader of the group. She is 32 years old and has two children. She sells fruits for a living. She generally earns 3,500,000 VND per month from this store. She joined SEDA crediting program in 2012. In this first loan, she wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND in order to enlarge her business of selling fruits and vegetables.

Vien is 31 years old. She sells fruits for a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND.
Thanh is 42 years old. She raises chicken eggs for a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND.
Hong is 30 years old. She raises pigs for a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND.
Sau is 38 years old. She sells fruits for a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND.

loans.use: to enlarge her business of selling fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Erwin

texts.en:
Erwin has grown rice crops for 15 years. He is married with three children. All his children go to school so he keeps on working hard to be able to provide their household needs, give allowances to the children and improve their living condition. He and his wife both perform some easy farming activities to economize their expenses in hiring more laborers to perform them.

Erwin is determined to obtain a better yield this next crop season because as his children grow their household expenditures will also increase. So, to make this dream come true, he applied for a loan of 20,000 Philippine pesos to buy pesticides and fertilizers for his rice crop maintenance. This farm input will ensure proper nutrition of his rice crop, which will lead to a plentiful yield upon harvest time. In this way, he can sell it for a higher price, which enables him to save for his children's education and improve their financial stability.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and fertilizers for his rice crop maintenance.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher is a 38-year-old gentleman living in Kagadi, Uganda. He has been operating a retail shop for over five years and with the proceeds he has been able to educate his children. He started with capital he got from farming and a motorcycle business and he also runs them alongside the retail shop. Inadequate capital is affecting the business, however, he would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. Christopher wants a loan to buy sugar and salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar and salt to sell.

loans.name: Sepa

texts.en:
Sepa is a 22-year-old woman who is married with no children. She runs a business of printing on cloth in her community. She has one year of experience with this business. 

Sepa has requested a loan to to buy new fabrics for printing. She plans to use her profits to improve the business and help her family. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy new fabrics for printing

loans.name: Orlando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 6 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 irmã que vive com ele.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, farinha, óleo, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro pretende construir um ESTALEIRO( negocio de venda de materiais de construcao como blocos, cimento, areia e outros localimente disponiveis) para crescer mais nos negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é adquirir uma viatura para transportar os seus produtos com mais segurança.
texts.en:
Orlando is married and the father of 6 children who all go to School, lives in his own house with his family and supports 1 sister who lives with him.

He has his own business selling food products and with this loan he plans to buy goods (peanuts, rice, flour, oil and others) to increase the quantity of his stock.

In future, Orlando intends to build a construction site where he will sell locally available materials like cement blocks, cement, sand. To this end, he commits to duly paying off his loan so that he can solicit further loans from Hluvuku. 

His challenge is to purchase a vehicle in order to transport his goods in a safer way.

loans.use: buy products (peanuts, rice, flour, oil and others) to increase the quantity of his stock.

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de carne de porco, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar mais carne de porco na Republica da África do sul para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro pretende construir uma mercearia em sua casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir reunir um valor suficiente para poder construir a sua mercearia e apetreche-la.
texts.en:
Celeste is married and the mother of 2 children who both attend School, lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She has her own business selling pork and with this loan she plans to buy more pork in the Republic of South Africa to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future, Celeste intends to build a grocery store at her house and to this end, she commits to duly paying off her loan so that she can solicit further loans from Hluvuku. 

Her challenge is to gather enough money to be able to build her grocery store and to fit it out.

loans.use: to purchase and sell pork

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. Mohamad is a youth client aged 29, married, and has three children.

Mohamad has owned a food market since 2008, selling soft drinks, juices, groceries, cheese, frozen beef, chicken, fish, and dairy products. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of the local customers, and knows about their needs.  He has a good reputation and is well-known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting $3,000 “youth loan” in order to purchase a generator and to increase his inventory.  He aims to gain more profit to offer him the opportunity to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a generator and to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Janet

texts.es:
Janet tiene 40 años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en una casa alquilada.
Desde hace 4 años ella y su esposo tienen una empresa donde realizan proyectos de instalación del servicio de agua potable y alcantarillado en diversas comunidades. Esta actividad le resulta beneficiosa, pues su cónyuge es ingeniero de profesión. Durante este tiempo de trabajo ha visto las grandes ventajas en sus ganancias por lo que ha decidido mejorar las instalaciones de su pequeña oficina, la que ha implementado en su casa. Por otro lado, tiene un restaurante, ya que su pasión es la cocina, ella es chef de profesión. 

Este es su sexto crédito con MFP y está muy contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Este préstamo le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio.
Janet invertirá el dinero en implementar la oficina que tiene en su casa, con la mejora del ambiente y los artículos de escritorio necesarios.
texts.en:
Janet is 40 years old, and lives with her husband and her two children in a rented house.  For four years she and her husband have had a business where they perform the installation of potable water and sewage service projects in various communities.  This work is beneficial, since her spouse is an engineer by profession.  During this time of work she has seen great gains in her profits so she has decided to improve the facilities of her small office, which she has implemented in her house.  On the other side she has a restaurant, since her passion is cooking and she is a chef by profession.  

This is her sixth loan with MFP and she is very happy to know that she has financial support.  She is also grateful to be part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and mutually supportive people.  This loan will be very useful to progressing her business.  Janet will invest the money in implementing the office that she has in her house, with improving the environment and the office supplies that she needs.

loans.use: to improve and implement her office.

loans.name: Alwar Cmt Group

texts.fr:
CES FEMMES FONT PARTIES DU BANC VILLAGEOIS DE ALWAR CMT CRÉE LE 11 JUILLET 2001. CES MEMBRES VIVENT EN PARFAITE HARMONIE ET LEUR ACTIVITÉ PRINCIPALE EST LE COMMERCE.

MADAME ANNA QUI EST A LA DROITE DE LA PHOTO LEVANT LA MAIN EST L'EMPRUNTEUSE EN VEDETTE. ELLE EST VEUVE ET MÈRE DE HUIT ENFANTS DONT TROIS FILLES ET CINQ GARÇONS. ELLE EST ÂGÉE DE 60 ANS.

ELLE S'ACTIVE DANS LA VENTE DE CITRON DE L'HUILE DE PALME DE BALAI ET DES LÉGUMES AU MARCHE LA OU ELLE A UN ÉTAL. ELLE S APPROVISIONNE DANS LES VILLAGES ENVIRONNANT. ELLE A CAPITALISE BEAUCOUP D ANNÉES D EXPÉRIENCE. 

AVEC LE PRÊT CONTRACTE ELLE COMPTE ACHETER TROIS BIDONS DE 30 LITRE DE CITRON DEUX BIDON DE 20 LITRE D HUILE DE PALME UNE VALEUR DE 10 000FCFA DE BALAI ET DES LÉGUMES.

AVEC LES BENEFICES ELLE ENVISAGE DE FAIRE DE L AVICULTURE ET D ACHETER DE LA NOURRITURE POUR SA FAMILLE.
texts.en:
These women are members of the Banc Villageois of ALWAR CMT created July 11, 2001. They live in complete harmony, and their main activity is trade. 
Mrs. ANNA, seen on the right with her hand raised, is a widow and mother of eight children, three girls and five boys. She is 60 years old. 

She sells lemons, palm oil, brooms and vegetables at the market where she has a booth. She buys her stock in the surrounding villages. She has many years of experience in this activity. 

She plans to use this loan to buy three 30-liter tubs of lemons, two 20-liter jugs of palm oil worth 10,000CFAF, some brooms and some vegetables.  

She will use her profits to feed her family and to raise poultry.

loans.use: to buy lemons, palm oil, brooms and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Boucotte Yamatogne Group

texts.fr:
CES MEMBRES FONT PARTI DU BANC VILLAGEOIS DE BOUCOTTE YAMATOGNE CRÉE LE 11 JUILLET 2002. L ACTIVITÉ PRINCIPALE DES FEMMES EST LE COMMERCE.

MADAME KHADIDIATOU QUI EST A LA DROITE DE LA PHOTO LEVANT LA MAIN ET L'EMPRUNTEUR EN VEDETTE. ELLE EST MARIÉE ET MÈRE DE QUATRE ENFANTS. ELLE EST ÂGÉE DE 63 ANS.

ELLE S'ACTIVE DANS LA VENTE DE CRÈME GLACE ACTIVITÉ QU ELLE MENÉ DEPUIS PLUSIEURS ANNÉES ET QUI MARCHE TRÈS FORT.

TOUS LES JOURS ELLE CHARGE EN CRÈME LES SEPT TIROIRS DE DIX BLOCS QUE COMPTE SON RÉFRIGÉRATEUR QU'ELLE VENDS AU NIVEAU DE SON QUARTIER ET ENVIRONS.  

L'OBJECTIF VISE PAR LES BÉNÉFICES C'EST LA PRISE EN CHARGE DE SES FRAIS DE SANTE.
texts.en:
These members belong to the 'Coucotte Yamatogne' village bank which was created on July 11th, 2002.  The main business activity of these women is commerce.  

Khadidiatou is the lady on the right of the photo with her hand raised.  She is the group's featured borrower.  She is married and the mother of four children.  She is 63 years old.

Khadidiatou's business is selling dairy ice cream.  She has been in this business for some years and is doing very well.

Every day, Khadidiatou fills each of the seven drawers of her freezer compartment with ten blocks of her ice cream and makes sales in her neighborhood and surrounding areas.

Khadidiatou's aim is to use her profits to cover her health expenses.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making dairy ice cream

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Raquel es una joven soltera de 24 años. Vive en la casa de sus hermanas, quienes la motivaron a iniciar un negocio propio.
Logró conseguir un puesto en el mercado de su localidad, donde vende abarrotes y diversos comestibles. Esta labor la empezó hace sólo 5 meses y comenta que le va muy bien en las ventas, a pesar de tener competencia, pues ella vende adicionalmente carne, verduras frescas y leche. Su meta es ahorrar las ganancias que está teniendo para comprar un terreno y construir su casa propia, por eso se esmera en su trabajo.

Con los 2500 nuevos soles de este préstamo se abastecerá de mercadería para incrementar la mercadería de su puesto.
texts.en:
Raquel is a single young woman who is 24 years of age.  She lives at the house of one of her sisters who convinced her to start her own business.  Raquel was able to obtain a stand at the market in her town where she sells groceries and various food products.  She started working only five months ago and says that she has done very well with her sales despite the competition.  Raquel sells meat, vegetables, cold drinks, and milk.  Her goal is to save her earnings so that she can buy a plot of land and build her own house.  For this reason, she works very hard at her job.  

Raquel will use this loan of 2500 PEN to restock with merchandise so that she can increase the inventory at her stand.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her grocery stand.

loans.name: Filifili

texts.en: Filifili is forty-seven years old and married with four children. She runs a small business selling light foods in her community and has been doing this for two years. Filifili  has requested a loan to purchase goods in order to restock her canteen. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Filifili will improve her business and help her family.

loans.use: to buy goods for her food stall.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Motuli

texts.en: Motuli is 40 years old and married with 8 children. She runs a small business selling cabbages, tomatoes and so on in her community and has been doing this for 2 years. She has requested a loan to buy chemicals for the production process. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Motuli will help her kids' education and improve the business.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetable seeds, chemicals for better results of production for the business

loans.name: Vira

texts.en: Vira is 55 years old and married with six children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for one year. Vira has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, baking powder, plastic bags, etc., for her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Vira will improve her business.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, baking powder, plastic bags, etc.

loans.name: Zhaneta

texts.en:
Zhaneta is in her early fifties and married. She has two children; twenty-seven and twenty-five years old. All of them live in a decent-sized village in the southeast of Albania. Life here is not that easy. They wake up extremely early in the morning to go to the field, feed and milk animals... While you drive by, you see all these people with straw hats covering their heads and plowing, planting & harvesting non-stop in the summer heat. They do so much hard labour.  She said, "It would be very nice to live a peaceful life and without any hard labor. Yet, that's just a dream for us." 
Her family owns a few "dynyms" of fields and also a few goats. 
Zhaneta has been VF Albania's client for the past six years and has proved to be a very responsible person, by paying off her loans on time and in full her monthly installments. At the moment, she is requesting another loan to add some more goats to the existing herd. The demand for goat cheese is high and she has a steady clientele. 
She thanks VFA and Kiva lenders for their understanding.

loans.use: To add goats to the existing herd

loans.name: Iveth

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa dos seus pais com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 irmão que vive com eles.
Trabalha como assistente administrativa numa empresa privada, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, pedra, areia, aros, janelas, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende progredir profissionalmente para melhorar o seu salário e as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é de viver longe do pai dos seus filhos e ter que resolver os problemas diários sozinhos.
texts.en:
Iveth is single and the mother of 2 children who both attend School, lives in her own house with her family and supports 1 brother who lives with them.

She works as an administrative assistant in a private company and with this loan she plans to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, frames, windows and others) to continue building her house.

In future she intends to progress professionally so as to improve her salary and her family’s living conditions. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is that she lives far away from her children’s father and having to resolve daily problems by herself.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, frames, windows and others) to continue building her house.

loans.name: Julinha

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhas das quais 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, arroz, farinha, óleo, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e ver as suas filhas formadas profissionalmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é adquirir uma viatura para transportar os seus produtos com mais segurança.
texts.en:
Julinha is single and the mother of 2 daughters, 1 of who attends School. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn’t support anyone else.

She has her own business selling foodstuffs and with this loan she plans to buy products (peanuts, rice, flour, oil and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she intends to finish building her house and see to it that her daughters have professional qualifications. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to buy a vehicle to transport her products more safely.

loans.use: buy products (peanuts, rice, flour, oil and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Felix

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha como militar, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, blocos, e outros) para dar a continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende concluir a sua casa para dar mais conforto e segurança a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o bem-estar da família e a formação dos seus filhos.
texts.en:
Felix is married and the father of 3 children, who all attend School, lives in his own house with his family and doesn’t support anyone else.

He works in the military and with this loan he plans to buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, blocks and others) to continue building his house.

In future he intends to finish his house so as to provide more comfort and safety for his family and to this end he commits to duly paying off his loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is his family’s well-being and the education of his children.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, sand, stone, blocks and others) to continue building his house

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhas das quais 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua sogra que vive com ela.
Tem um negócio próprio de venda de produtos alimentares, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, ferro, barrotes, vidros, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa.
No futuro pretende ampliar o seu negócio adquirindo grandes quantidades de mercadoria para aumentar mais o volume de vendas, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é construir um estabelecimento maior para que possa diversificar ainda mais os produtos.
texts.en:
Amelia is married and the mother of 2 children, 1 of who attends School. She lives in her own house with her family and supports her mother-in-law who lives with her.

She has her own business selling foodstuffs and with this loan she plans to buy construction materials (cement, iron, beams, windows and others) to continue building her house.

In future she intends to expand her business by purchasing large quantities of merchandise so as to increase the volume of sales. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to build a bigger establishment so that she can diversify her products even futher.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, iron, beams, windows and others) to continue building her house.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 3 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta a sua nora e neta que vivem com ela.
É funcionaria publica numa instituição do Estado, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento cola, tijoleiras e mão de obra) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro espera continuar com o seu trabalho ate atingir a reforma e abrir um negocio próprio para aumentar a sua renda mensal, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para ajudar nos seus projectos.
texts.en:
Catarina is a widow and the mother of 3 children, 1 of who attends School. She lives in her own house with her family and supports her daughter-in-law and granddaughter who live with her.

She is a civil servant in a Government institution and with this loan she plans to buy construction materials (cement, bricks and labour) to continue the building work on her house.

In future she hopes to continue working until she reaches retirement age and open her own business to increase her monthly income. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to finish her house and purchase a vehicle to help with her projects.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, bricks and labour) to continue the building work on her house.

loans.name: Artemiza

texts.pt:
Divorciada e ainda não tem filhos, vive na casa própria sozinha e não sustenta ninguem.
É militar e quadro do Ministerio da Defesa, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (madeiras para mandar fabricar portas, aros e janelas) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa.
No futuro deseja progredir no seu trabalho e abrir uma área para a pratica de agricultura, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é concluir a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura para auxiliar no seu trabalho e transporte pessoal.
texts.en:
Artemiza is divorced and doesn’t yet have any children, lives in her own house alone and doesn’t support anyone.

She is in the military and a permanent employee of the Ministry of Defence. With this loan she plans to buy construction materials (wood from which she’ll have doors made, frames and windows) to continue the building work on her house.

In future she hopes to progress in her job and open an area for hands-on agriculture. To this end she commits to duly paying off her loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to finish her house and purchase a vehicle to help with her work and personal transport.

loans.use: buy construction materials (wood from which she’ll have doors made, frames and windows) to continue the building work on her house.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.pt:
Divorciado e pai de 3 filhos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com um dos filhos e não sustenta mais ninguém.
Trabalha no Notório como escriturário, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, vidros, janelas e outros) para melhorar a sua residência. 
No futuro deseja ter um carro para fazer transporte público a aumentar a sua renda mensal, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o baixo salário para poder realizar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Manuel is divorced and the father of 3 children who are all of age, lives in his own house with his family and doesn’t support anyone else.

He works in the Notary as a clerk and with this loan he plans to buy construction materials (cement, glass, windows and others) to improve his residence.

In future he hopes to have a car so that he can start providing public transport to increase his monthly income. To this end he commits to duly paying off his loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is being able to carry out his projects on his low salary.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, glass, windows and others) to improve his residence.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.pt:
Solteiro e pai de 1 filho que vive com mãe dele, vive na casa do seu pai e não sustenta mais ninguém para além do filho que vive com a mãe.
Trabalha numa loja de venda de serviços telefónicos, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, areia, pedra, janelas e outros) para dar continuidade com a sua obra. 
No futuro deseja progredir profissionalmente e constituir uma família na sua própria casa, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é finalizar a sua obra, que não tem sido fácil devido ao baixo salário.
texts.en:
